subsubsection â€¹Basic Rulesâ€º

lemma Disjunction_expn[iff, Ï†expns]:
  â€¹p âŠ¨ (A + B) âŸ· p âŠ¨ A âˆ¨ p âŠ¨ Bâ€º
  unfolding Satisfaction_def
  by (simp add: plus_BI_def)

lemma Add_Disj_Satisfiable[simp]:
  â€¹ Satisfiable (A + B) âŸ· Satisfiable A âˆ¨ Satisfiable B â€º
  unfolding Satisfiable_def
  by clarsimp blast

lemma [Ï†reason %cutting]:
  â€¹ X ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ A
âŸ¹ Y ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ B
âŸ¹ X + Y ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ A âˆ¨ Bâ€º
  unfolding ğ—‹EIF_def Satisfiable_def
  by simp blast

lemma [Ï†reason %cutting]:
  â€¹ A ğ—Œğ—ğ–¿ğ–¿ğ—‚ğ–¼ğ–¾ğ—Œ X
âŸ¹ B ğ—Œğ—ğ–¿ğ–¿ğ—‚ğ–¼ğ–¾ğ—Œ Y
âŸ¹ A âˆ¨ B ğ—Œğ—ğ–¿ğ–¿ğ—‚ğ–¼ğ–¾ğ—Œ X + Yâ€º
  unfolding ğ—‹ESC_def Satisfiable_def
  by simp blast

text â€¹The above two rules are reversible.â€º

lemma set_plus_inhabited[elim!]:
  â€¹Satisfiable (S + T) âŸ¹ (Satisfiable S âŸ¹ C) âŸ¹ (Satisfiable T âŸ¹ C) âŸ¹ Câ€º
  unfolding Satisfiable_def
  by (simp, blast)

lemma implies_union:
  â€¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X + Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  â€¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X + Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  unfolding Transformation_def
  by simp_all

declare add_mono[Ï†reason 1000]


subsubsection â€¹Transformation Rulesâ€º

paragraph â€¹In Sourceâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_splitting]:
  â€¹ B ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P1
âŸ¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P2
âŸ¹ A + B ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P1 âˆ¨ P2â€º
  by (simp add: Transformation_def)

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_splitting]:
  â€¹ B * R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P1
âŸ¹ A * R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P2
âŸ¹ (A + B) * R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P1 âˆ¨ P2â€º
  by (simp add: Transformation_def distrib_left) blast

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_splitting+10]:
  â€¹ B ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ RB ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P1
âŸ¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ RA ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P2
âŸ¹ RA + RB ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ RR @clean
âŸ¹ A + B ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ RR ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P1 âˆ¨ P2â€º
  by (simp add: Transformation_def Action_Tag_def; meson)

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_splitting+10]:
  â€¹ B * R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ RB ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P1
âŸ¹ A * R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ RA ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P2
âŸ¹ RA + RB ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ RR @clean
âŸ¹ (A + B) * R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ RR ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P1 âˆ¨ P2â€º
  by (simp add: Transformation_def Action_Tag_def; blast)

lemma [Ï†reason add]:
  â€¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ R @clean
âŸ¹ 0 + A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ R @clean â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason add]:
  â€¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ R @clean
âŸ¹ A + 0 ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ R @clean â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason add]:
  â€¹ A + A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A @clean â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by simp


paragraph â€¹In Targetâ€º

lemma ToA_disj_target_A:
  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A + B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  unfolding plus_set_def
  by (metis implies_union(1) plus_set_def)

lemma ToA_disj_target_B:
  â€¹  X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹  X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A + B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  by (simp add: Transformation_def)
 
declare [[Ï†reason ! %ToA_branches ToA_disj_target_A ToA_disj_target_B for â€¹?X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ?A + ?B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— ?P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º]]

hide_fact ToA_disj_target_A ToA_disj_target_B

lemma ToA_disj_target_A':
  â€¹  X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹  X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A + B ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def REMAINS_def Transformation_def
  by (simp add: distrib_left; blast)

lemma ToA_disj_target_B':
  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A + B ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def REMAINS_def Transformation_def
  by (simp add: distrib_left; blast)

declare [[Ï†reason ! %ToA_branches ToA_disj_target_A' ToA_disj_target_B'
            for â€¹?X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ?A + ?B ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º]]

hide_fact ToA_disj_target_A' ToA_disj_target_B'

lemma [Ï†reason add]:
  â€¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A + A @clean â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason add]:
  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A @clean
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A + 0 @clean â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason add]:
  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A @clean
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ 0 + A @clean â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by simp


subsection â€¹Existential Quantificationâ€º

lemma ExBI_inhabited_E[elim!]:
  â€¹Satisfiable (ExBI S) âŸ¹ (â‹€x. Satisfiable (S x) âŸ¹ C) âŸ¹ Câ€º
  unfolding Satisfiable_def
  by simp blast

lemma [Ï†reason %cutting]:
  â€¹ (â‹€x. S x ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ C x)
âŸ¹ ExBI S ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ Ex C â€º
  unfolding Satisfiable_def ğ—‹EIF_def
  by (simp; blast)

lemma [Ï†reason %cutting]:
  â€¹ (â‹€x. C x ğ—Œğ—ğ–¿ğ–¿ğ—‚ğ–¼ğ–¾ğ—Œ S x)
âŸ¹ Ex C ğ—Œğ—ğ–¿ğ–¿ğ—‚ğ–¼ğ–¾ğ—Œ ExBI S â€º
  unfolding Satisfiable_def ğ—‹ESC_def
  by (simp; blast)

lemma ExBI_Satisfiable[simp]:
  â€¹ Satisfiable (âˆƒ*x. S x) âŸ· (âˆƒx. Satisfiable (S x)) â€º
  unfolding Satisfiable_def
  by clarsimp blast


subsubsection â€¹Syntaxâ€º

syntax
  "_SetcomprNu" :: "'a â‡’ pttrns â‡’ bool â‡’ 'a BI"  ("_ ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ/ _./ _" [14,0,15] 14)

parse_translation â€¹[
  (\<^syntax_const>â€¹_SetcomprNuâ€º, fn ctxt => fn [X,idts,P] =>
  let fun subst l Bs (Free v) =
            let val i = find_index (fn v' => v = v') Bs
             in if i = ~1 then Free v else Bound (i+l)
            end
        | subst l Bs (A $ B) = subst l Bs A $ subst l Bs B
        | subst l Bs (Abs(N,T,X)) = Abs(N,T, subst (l+1) Bs X)
        | subst l Bs X = X
      fun trans_one (Bs,C) (Const(\<^syntax_const>â€¹_unitâ€º, _))
            = Abs ("", \<^Type>â€¹unitâ€º, C [])
        | trans_one (Bs,C) (Const(\<^const_syntax>â€¹Pairâ€º, _)
                                $ (Const (\<^syntax_const>â€¹_constrainâ€º, _) $ Free (A, T) $ Ac)
                                $ B)
            = Const(\<^const_syntax>â€¹case_prodâ€º, dummyT) $ (
                Const(\<^syntax_const>â€¹_constrainAbsâ€º, dummyT)
                  $ Abs (A, T, trans_one ((A,T)::Bs, C) B)
                  $ Ac
              )
        | trans_one (Bs,C) (Const(\<^const_syntax>â€¹Pairâ€º, _)
                                $ (Const (\<^syntax_const>â€¹_constrainâ€º, _)
                                      $ (Const (\<^syntax_const>â€¹_constrainâ€º, _) $ Free (A, T) $ T') $ Ac)
                                $ B)
            = Const(\<^const_syntax>â€¹case_prodâ€º, dummyT) $ (
                Const(\<^syntax_const>â€¹_constrainAbsâ€º, dummyT)
                  $ (Const(\<^syntax_const>â€¹_constrainAbsâ€º, dummyT)
                      $ Abs (A, T, trans_one ((A,T)::Bs, C) B)
                      $ T')
                  $ Ac
              )
        | trans_one (Bs,C) (Const(\<^const_syntax>â€¹Pairâ€º, _)
                                $ Const (\<^syntax_const>â€¹_unitâ€º, _)
                                $ B)
            = Const(\<^const_syntax>â€¹case_prodâ€º, dummyT) $ (
                Const(\<^syntax_const>â€¹_constrainAbsâ€º, dummyT)
                  $ Abs ("", dummyT, trans_one (Bs, C) B)
                  $ Const(\<^type_syntax>â€¹unitâ€º, dummyT)
              )
        | trans_one (Bs,C) (Const (\<^syntax_const>â€¹_constrainâ€º, _) $ Free (A, T) $ Ac)
            = Const(\<^syntax_const>â€¹_constrainAbsâ€º, dummyT)
                  $ Abs (A, T, C ((A,T)::Bs))
                  $ Ac
      fun trans (Const (\<^syntax_const>â€¹_pttrnsâ€º, _) $ A $ B) Bs
            = Const (\<^const_syntax>â€¹ExBIâ€º, dummyT) $ trans_one (Bs,trans B) A
        | trans B Bs
            = Const (\<^const_syntax>â€¹ExBIâ€º, dummyT) $ trans_one (Bs, (fn Bs =>
                case P of(* Const (\<^syntax_const>â€¹_constrainâ€º, _) $ Free ("True",_) $ _
                            => subst 0 Bs X
                        |*) Const (\<^const_syntax>â€¹topâ€º, _)
                            => subst 0 Bs X
                        | _ => Const (\<^const_syntax>â€¹Subjectionâ€º, dummyT) $ subst 0 Bs X $ subst 0 Bs P
              )) B
   in trans idts [] end)
]â€º

print_translation â€¹[
  (\<^const_syntax>â€¹ExBIâ€º, fn ctxt => fn [X] =>
    let fun subst l Bs (Bound i)
              = if l <= i andalso i-l <= length Bs then List.nth(Bs, i-l) else Bound i
          | subst l Bs (Abs (N,T,X)) = Abs (N,T, subst (l+1) Bs X)
          | subst l Bs (A $ B) = subst l Bs A $ subst l Bs B
          | subst l Bs X = X
        fun trans (Vs,Bs) (Const(\<^const_syntax>â€¹case_prodâ€º, _) $ Abs (A,T,X))
              = if T = \<^Type>â€¹unitâ€º andalso A = ""
                then trans (Const(\<^syntax_const>â€¹_unitâ€º, dummyT) :: Vs, Bs) X
                else let val bound = Const(\<^syntax_const>â€¹_boundâ€º, dummyT) $ Free(A,T)
                      in trans (bound::Vs, bound::Bs) X
                     end
          | trans (Vs,Bs) (Abs(A,T, Const(\<^const_syntax>â€¹ExBIâ€º, _) $ X))
              = let val bound = Const(\<^syntax_const>â€¹_boundâ€º, dummyT) $ Free(A,T)
                    val var = fold (fn v => fn v' => Const(\<^const_syntax>â€¹Pairâ€º,dummyT) $ v $ v')
                                    Vs bound
                    val (X',idts',P') = trans ([], bound :: Bs) X
                 in (X', Const(\<^syntax_const>â€¹_pttrnsâ€º, dummyT) $ var $ idts', P')
                end
          | trans (Vs,Bs0) (Abs(A,T,B))
              = let val bound = Const(\<^syntax_const>â€¹_boundâ€º, dummyT) $ Free(A,T)
                    val v' = if T = \<^Type>â€¹unitâ€º andalso A = ""
                             then Const(\<^syntax_const>â€¹_unitâ€º, dummyT)
                             else bound
                    val var = fold (fn v => fn v' => Const(\<^const_syntax>â€¹Pairâ€º,dummyT) $ v $ v')
                                    Vs v'
                    val Bs = bound :: Bs0
                    val (X,P) = case B of Const(\<^const_syntax>â€¹Subjectionâ€º, _) $ X $ P => (X,P)
                                        | _ => (B, Const(\<^const_syntax>â€¹topâ€º, dummyT))
                 in (subst 0 Bs X, var, subst 0 Bs P)
                end
        val (X',idts',P') = trans ([],[]) X
     in Const(\<^syntax_const>â€¹_SetcomprNuâ€º, dummyT) $ X' $ idts' $ P' end)
]â€º


subsubsection â€¹Semantic Explanationâ€º

text â€¹Semantically, an existential quantification in BI actually represents union of resources
  matching the existentially quantified assertion, as shown by the following lemma.â€º

lemma " BI (Union { BI.dest (S x) |x. P x }) = (S x ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ x. P x) "
  by (simp add: set_eq_iff ExBI_def Subjection_def) (meson Satisfaction_def)

subsubsection â€¹Basic Rulesâ€º

lemma BI_Ex_comm:
  â€¹(âˆƒ* x y. A x y) = (âˆƒ* y x. A x y)â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
  by (simp, blast)


subsubsection â€¹Simplificationsâ€º

lemma ExBI_pair: "ExBI T = (âˆƒ*a b. T (a,b))"
  unfolding BI_eq_iff by clarsimp

lemma ExBI_simps[simp, Ï†programming_base_simps, Ï†safe_simp]:
  â€¹ExBI 0 = 0â€º
  â€¹ExBI (Î»_. T) = Tâ€º
  â€¹((âˆƒ*c. X c) ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ PP) = (âˆƒ*c. X c ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ PP)â€º
  â€¹(F' y ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y. embedded_func f' P' x' y) = (F' (f' x') ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P' x')â€º
(*  â€¹(âˆƒ* x. x = t âˆ§ P x) = P tâ€º
"â‹€P. (âˆƒx. x = t âˆ§ P x) = P t"
    "â‹€P. (âˆƒx. t = x âˆ§ P x) = P t"*)
  unfolding BI_eq_iff embedded_func_def
  by simp_all

lemma ExBI_defined[Ï†programming_base_simps, simp, Ï†safe_simp]:
  â€• â€¹only safe for source side but unsafe for target side, because it could instantiate variables
      of types parameters which could be instantiated arbitrarily?... I am not pretty sure... It is subtle hereâ€º
  â€¹(âˆƒ* x. F x ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ x = y) = (F y)â€º
  â€¹(âˆƒ* x. F x ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y = x) = (F y)â€º
  â€¹(âˆƒ* x. F x ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ x = y âˆ§ P x) = (F y ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P y)â€º
  â€¹(âˆƒ* x. F x ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y = x âˆ§ P x) = (F y ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P y)â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
  by simp_all

lemma Ex_transformation_expn:
  â€¹((âˆƒ*x. A x) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P) âŸ· (âˆ€x. A x ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P)â€º
  unfolding Transformation_def ExBI_expn
  by blast

lemma ExBI_split_prod[Ï†programming_base_simps, Ï†safe_simp]:
  â€¹ (âˆƒ*x. (case x of (a,b) â‡’ f a b)) = (âˆƒ*a b. f a b) â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
  by clarsimp

lemma ExBI_subj_split_prod[Ï†programming_base_simps, Ï†safe_simp]:
  â€¹ (âˆƒ* x. A x ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ (case x of (a,b) â‡’ P a b)) = (âˆƒ* a b. A (a,b) ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P a b) â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
  by clarsimp




paragraph â€¹With Multiplicative Conjunctionâ€º

lemma ExBI_times_left [simp, Ï†programming_base_simps, Ï†safe_simp]:
  "((âˆƒ* c. T c) * R) = (âˆƒ* c. T c * R )"
  by (simp add: BI_eq_iff, blast)

lemma ExBI_times_right[simp, Ï†programming_base_simps, Ï†safe_simp]:
  "(L * (âˆƒ*c. T c)) = (âˆƒ* c. L * T c)"
  by (simp add: BI_eq_iff, blast)


paragraph â€¹With Additive Disjunctionâ€º

lemma ExBI_addisj:
  â€¹A + (âˆƒ*c. B c) â‰¡ âˆƒ*c. A + B câ€º
  â€¹(âˆƒ*c. B c) + A â‰¡ âˆƒ*c. B c + Aâ€º
  unfolding atomize_eq BI_eq_iff
  by simp+


subsubsection â€¹Transformation Rulesâ€º

lemma ExBI_transformation:
  â€¹(â‹€x. S x ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ S' x ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P)
âŸ¹ ExBI S ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ExBI S' ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  unfolding Transformation_def by (clarsimp, blast)

lemma ExBI_transformation_I:
  â€¹ S ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ S' x ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ S ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (ExBI S') ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  unfolding Transformation_def by (clarsimp, blast)

lemma ExBI_transformation_I_R:
  â€¹ S ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ S' x ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ S ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (ExBI S') ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  unfolding Transformation_def
  by (clarsimp, blast)


lemma ExBI_additive_disj:
  â€¹(âˆƒ*x. A x + B x) = (âˆƒ*x. A x) + (âˆƒ*x. B x)â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff by (simp_all add: plus_fun) blast+

ML_file â€¹library/tools/simproc_ExSet_expand_quantifier.MLâ€º


subsubsection â€¹ToA Reasoningâ€º

lemma skolemize_transformation[Ï†reason %ToA_fixes_quant]:
  "(â‹€x.  T x ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P x)
âŸ¹ ExBI T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Ex P"
  unfolding Transformation_def by simp fastforce

lemma skolemize_transformation_R[Ï†reason %ToA_fixes_quant+5]:
  "(â‹€x.  T x ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R x ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P x)
âŸ¹ ExBI R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ RR @clean
âŸ¹ ExBI T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ RR ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Ex P"
  unfolding Transformation_def REMAINS_def Action_Tag_def by (simp; blast)

lemma skolemize_transformation_tR[Ï†reason %ToA_fixes_quant+5]:
  "(â‹€x.  T x ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Ï†TagA mode (U ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R x) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P x)
âŸ¹ ExBI R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ RR @clean
âŸ¹ ExBI T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Ï†TagA mode (U ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ RR) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Ex P"
  unfolding Transformation_def REMAINS_def Ï†TagA_def Action_Tag_def
  by (simp; blast)

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_fixes_quant]:
  "(â‹€x. T x * W ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P x)
âŸ¹ ExBI T * W ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Ex P"
  unfolding Transformation_def by simp fastforce

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_fixes_quant+5]:
  "(â‹€x. T x * W ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R x ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P x)
âŸ¹ ExBI R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ RR @clean
âŸ¹ ExBI T * W ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ RR ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Ex P"
  unfolding Transformation_def Action_Tag_def by (simp; blast)

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_fixes_quant+5]:
  "(â‹€x. T x * W ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Ï†TagA mode (U ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R x) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P x)
âŸ¹ ExBI R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ RR @clean
âŸ¹ ExBI T * W ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Ï†TagA mode (U ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ RR) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Ex P"
  unfolding Transformation_def Ï†TagA_def Action_Tag_def
  by (simp; blast)

subsubsection â€¹Cleaningâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason add]:
  â€¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ R @clean
âŸ¹ (âˆƒ*_. A) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ R @clean â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def Transformation_def
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason add]:
  â€¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ R @clean
âŸ¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (âˆƒ*_. R) @clean â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def Transformation_def
  by simp


text â€¹Continued in \ref{supp-ex-conj}â€º


subsection â€¹Additive Conjunctionâ€º


lemma Additive_Conj_expn[iff, Ï†expns]:
  â€¹p âŠ¨ (A âŠ“ B) âŸ· p âŠ¨ A âˆ§ p âŠ¨ Bâ€º
  by (cases A; cases B; simp)

lemma additive_conj_inhabited_E[elim!]:
  â€¹Satisfiable (A âŠ“ B) âŸ¹ (Satisfiable A âŸ¹ Satisfiable B âŸ¹ C) âŸ¹ Câ€º
  unfolding Satisfiable_def
  by simp blast

lemma [Ï†reason %cutting]:
  â€¹ A ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ P
âŸ¹ B ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ Q
âŸ¹ A âŠ“ B ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ P âˆ§ Qâ€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def ğ—‹EIF_def
  by blast

lemma
  â€¹ P ğ—Œğ—ğ–¿ğ–¿ğ—‚ğ–¼ğ–¾ğ—Œ A
âŸ¹ Q ğ—Œğ—ğ–¿ğ–¿ğ—‚ğ–¼ğ–¾ğ—Œ B
âŸ¹ P âˆ§ Q ğ—Œğ—ğ–¿ğ–¿ğ—‚ğ–¼ğ–¾ğ—Œ A âŠ“ Bâ€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def Satisfiable_def
  oops

text â€¹There is no sufficiency reasoning for additive conjunction, because the sufficient condition
  of â€¹A âŠ“ Bâ€º cannot be reasoned separately (by considering â€¹Aâ€º and â€¹Bâ€º separately).â€º


subsubsection â€¹Simplificationâ€º

paragraph â€¹With ExBIâ€º

lemma ExBI_adconj:
  â€¹A âŠ“ (âˆƒ*c. B c) â‰¡ âˆƒ*c. A âŠ“ B câ€º
  â€¹(âˆƒ*c. B c) âŠ“ A â‰¡ âˆƒ*c. B c âŠ“ Aâ€º
  unfolding atomize_eq BI_eq_iff
  by simp+


subsubsection â€¹Transformation Rulesâ€º

text â€¹Non-pure Additive Conjunction (excludes those are used in pure propositions), is rarely used under our
  refinement interpretation of BI assertions, because we can hardly imagine when and why an object
  has to be specified by two abstractions that cannot transform to each other (if they can,
  it is enough to use any one of them with a strong constraint over the abstraction, and transform it
  to the other when needed). We believe those abstractions if exist are specific enough to be preferably
  expressed by a specific Ï†-type equipped with ad-hoc reasoning rules.

  To support additive conjunction, it brings enormous branches in the reasoning so affects the
  reasoning performance. Before applying the rules introduced previously, we can add the following
  rules which are also attempted subsequently in order and applied whenever possible.
  â€¹X âŸ¶ A âŸ¹ X âŸ¶ B âŸ¹ X âŸ¶ A âˆ§ Bâ€º generates two subgoals.
  â€¹(A âŸ¶ Y) âˆ¨ (B âŸ¶ Y) âŸ¹ A âˆ§ B âŸ¶ Yâ€º branches the reasoning. Specially, when â€¹Y â‰¡ âˆƒx. P xâ€º is an
  existential quantification containing non-pure additive conjunction (e.g. â€¹P x â‰¡ C x âˆ§ D xâ€º),
  the priority of eliminating â€¹âˆ§â€º or instantiating â€¹âˆƒâ€º is significant.
  We attempt the both priorities by a search branch.
(*  If we instantiate first, the instantiation is forced to be identical in the two branches.
  If we eliminate â€¹âˆ§â€º first, the â€¹Pâ€º can be too strong *)
  This rule is irreversible and we recall our hypothesis that Ï†-types between the conjunction are
  considered disjoint, i.e., we only consider â€¹(x â¦‚ T) âˆ§ (y â¦‚ U) âŸ¶ Yâ€º when
  either â€¹x â¦‚ T âŸ¶ Yâ€º or â€¹y â¦‚ U âŸ¶ Yâ€º.
â€º

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_splitting]:
  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P1
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P2
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A âŠ“ B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P1 âˆ§ P2 â€º
  unfolding Transformation_def
  by simp

lemma NToA_conj_src_A:
  â€¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ A âŠ“ B ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P â€º
  unfolding Transformation_def
  by simp blast

lemma NToA_conj_src_B:
  â€¹ B ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ A âŠ“ B ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P â€º
  unfolding Transformation_def
  by simp blast

text â€¹Continued in \ref{supp-ex-conj}â€º


subsection â€¹Subjection: Conjunction to a Pure Factâ€º

text â€¹This is the only widely used additive conjunction under the interpretation of the Ï† data refinementâ€º

subsubsection â€¹Basic Rulesâ€º

lemma Subjection_inhabited_E[elim!]:
  â€¹Satisfiable (S ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P) âŸ¹ (Satisfiable S âŸ¹ P âŸ¹ C) âŸ¹ Câ€º
  unfolding Satisfiable_def
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %cutting]:
  â€¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ P âŸ¹ S ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ C)
âŸ¹ S ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ P âˆ§ C â€º
  unfolding Satisfiable_def Action_Tag_def Premise_def ğ—‹EIF_def
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %cutting]:
  â€¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ P âŸ¹ C ğ—Œğ—ğ–¿ğ–¿ğ—‚ğ–¼ğ–¾ğ—Œ S)
âŸ¹ P âˆ§ C ğ—Œğ—ğ–¿ğ–¿ğ—‚ğ–¼ğ–¾ğ—Œ S ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P â€º
  unfolding Satisfiable_def Action_Tag_def Premise_def ğ—‹ESC_def
  by simp 

lemma Subjection_imp_I:
  â€¹ P
âŸ¹ S ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ S' ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Q
âŸ¹ S ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ S' ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Qâ€º
  unfolding Transformation_def by simp


subsubsection â€¹Simplificationâ€º

lemma Subjection_cong:
  â€¹P â‰¡ P' âŸ¹ (P' âŸ¹ S â‰¡ S') âŸ¹ (S ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P) â‰¡ (S' ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P')â€º
  unfolding atomize_eq BI_eq_iff by (simp, blast)

lemma Subjection_eq:
  â€¹(A ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P) = (A' ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P) âŸ· (P âŸ¶ A = A')â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
  by clarsimp blast

lemma Subjection_imp_simp[simp]:
  â€¹ (A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Q) âŸ· (A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P âˆ§ Q) â€º
  unfolding Transformation_def by simp

lemma Subjection_True [simp, Ï†programming_base_simps, Ï†safe_simp]:
  â€¹(T ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ True) = Tâ€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff by simp

lemma Subjection_Flase[simp, Ï†programming_base_simps, Ï†safe_simp]:
  â€¹(T ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ False) = 0â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff by simp

lemma Subjection_Subjection[simp, Ï†programming_base_simps, Ï†safe_simp]:
  â€¹(S ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ Q) = (S ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P âˆ§ Q)â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
  by simp



lemma Subjection_Zero[simp, Ï†programming_base_simps, Ï†safe_simp]:
  â€¹(0 ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P) = 0â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
  by simp

lemma Subjection_transformation:
  â€¹ S ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ S' ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ S ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ Q ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ S' ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ Q ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  unfolding Transformation_def by (simp; blast)

lemma Subjection_transformation_rewr:
  â€¹ (A ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ Q ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P) âŸ· (Q âŸ¶ (A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P))â€º
  unfolding Transformation_def by (simp; blast)


subparagraph â€¹With Additive Conjunctionâ€º

lemma Subjection_addconj[simp, Ï†programming_base_simps, Ï†safe_simp]:
  â€¹(A ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P) âŠ“ B â‰¡ (A âŠ“ B) ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ Pâ€º
  â€¹B âŠ“ (A ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P) â‰¡ (B âŠ“ A) ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ Pâ€º
  unfolding atomize_eq BI_eq_iff
  by (clarsimp; blast)+

subparagraph â€¹With Additive Disjunctionâ€º

lemma Subjection_plus_distrib:
  â€¹(A + B ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P) = (A ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P) + (B ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P)â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
  by simp blast

subparagraph â€¹With Multiplicative Conjunctionâ€º

lemma Subjection_times[simp, Ï†programming_base_simps, Ï†safe_simp]:
  â€¹(S ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P) * T = (S * T ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P)â€º
  â€¹T * (S ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P) = (T * S ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P)â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
  by (simp, blast)+


subsubsection â€¹Transformation Rulesâ€º

Ï†reasoner_group ToA_subj = (%ToA_assertion_cut, [%ToA_assertion_cut, %ToA_assertion_cut+20]) for â€¹T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ Q ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  â€¹Transformation rules handling â€¹Subjectionâ€ºâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_subj]:
  " T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ ğ—‰ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ—‚ğ—Œğ–¾ (P âŸ¶ Q)
âŸ¹ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ Q ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P "
  unfolding Transformation_def Premise_def
  by simp

  " T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P âŸ¹
    T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ True ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P "
  unfolding Transformation_def by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_subj]:
  " T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ ğ—‰ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ—‚ğ—Œğ–¾ (P âŸ¶ Q)
âŸ¹ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ Q ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P "
  unfolding Transformation_def Premise_def
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red]:
  " T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P âŸ¹
    T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ True ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P "
  unfolding Transformation_def by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_subj+10]: (*THINK: add Q in P, is good or not?*)
  "ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ Q âŸ¶ (T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«)
âŸ¹ T ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ Q ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Q âˆ§ P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«"

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_subj+20]:

âŸ¹ T ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ Q ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ Q ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«"
  unfolding Transformation_def Premise_def Action_Tag_def
  by simp blast

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_subj+20]:
  "ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ Q âŸ¶ (T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Ï†TagA mode (U ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«)
âŸ¹ T ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ Q ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Ï†TagA mode (U ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ Q) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«"
  unfolding Transformation_def Premise_def Ï†TagA_def Action_Tag_def

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_subj+10]:

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_subj+20]:

âŸ¹ (T ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ Q) * W ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Ï†TagA mode (U ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ Q) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«"
  unfolding Transformation_def Premise_def Ï†TagA_def Action_Tag_def
  by simp blast



subsection â€¹Multiplicative Conjunctionâ€º

text â€¹Is the \<^term>â€¹(*) :: ('a::sep_magma) BI â‡’ 'a BI â‡’ 'a BIâ€º directlyâ€º

lemma set_mult_inhabited[elim!]:
  â€¹Satisfiable (S * T) âŸ¹ (Satisfiable S âŸ¹ Satisfiable T âŸ¹ C) âŸ¹ Câ€º
  unfolding Satisfiable_def
  by (simp, blast)

lemma [Ï†reason %cutting]:
  â€¹ X ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ A
âŸ¹ Y ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ B
âŸ¹ X * Y ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ A âˆ§ Bâ€º
  unfolding ğ—‹EIF_def
  using set_mult_inhabited by blast

lemma [Ï†reason %cutting]:
  â€¹ X ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ A
âŸ¹ Y ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ B
âŸ¹ X ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ Y ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ A âˆ§ Bâ€º
  unfolding ğ—‹EIF_def REMAINS_def
  using set_mult_inhabited by blast

lemma
  â€¹ A ğ—Œğ—ğ–¿ğ–¿ğ—‚ğ–¼ğ–¾ğ—Œ X
âŸ¹ B ğ—Œğ—ğ–¿ğ–¿ğ—‚ğ–¼ğ–¾ğ—Œ Y
âŸ¹ A âˆ§ B ğ—Œğ—ğ–¿ğ–¿ğ—‚ğ–¼ğ–¾ğ—Œ X * Yâ€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def Satisfiable_def
  apply clarsimp
  oops

text â€¹There is no sufficiency reasoning for multiplicative conjunction, because if we reason A and B
  separately, we loose the constraint about A and B are separatable, A ## B..â€º


lemma eq_left_frame:
  â€¹ A = B âŸ¹ R * A = R * B â€º
  by simp

lemma eq_right_frame:
  â€¹ A = B âŸ¹ A * R = B * R â€º
  by simp

lemma transformation_left_frame:
  "U' ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P âŸ¹ R * U' ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ R * U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P "
  unfolding Transformation_def split_paired_All sep_conj_expn by blast

lemma transformation_right_frame:
  "U' ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P âŸ¹ U' * R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U * R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P "
  unfolding Transformation_def split_paired_All sep_conj_expn by blast

lemma transformation_bi_frame:
  " R' ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ L' ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ L ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Q
âŸ¹ L' * R' ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ L * R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P âˆ§ Q "
  unfolding Transformation_def split_paired_All sep_conj_expn by blast


subsection â€¹Finite Multiplicative Quantification (FMQ)â€º

definition Mul_Quant :: â€¹('a â‡’ 'b::sep_algebra BI) â‡’ 'a set â‡’ 'b BIâ€º ("âœ±")
  where â€¹Mul_Quant A S â‰¡ (prod A S ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ finite S)â€º

text â€¹Finite Multiplicative Quantification â€¹âœ±iâˆˆI. Aâ‡©iâ€º is inductively applying separation conjunction
  over a finite family â€¹{Aâ‡©i}â€º of assertions indexed by â€¹iâˆˆIâ€º, e.g., â€¹(âœ±iâˆˆI. Aâ‡©i) = Aâ‡©1 * Aâ‡©2 * â€¦ * Aâ‡©nâ€º for
  â€¹I = {1,2,â€¦,n}â€ºâ€º

syntax
  "_Mul_Quant" :: "pttrn => 'a set => 'b => 'b::comm_monoid_mult"  ("(2âœ±(_/âˆˆ_)./ _)" [0, 51, 14] 14)
translations â€• â€¹Beware of argument permutation!â€º
  "âœ±iâˆˆA. b" == "CONST Mul_Quant (Î»i. b) A"

syntax
  "_qMul_Quant" :: "pttrn â‡’ bool â‡’ 'a â‡’ 'a"  ("(2âœ±_ | (_)./ _)" [0, 0, 14] 14)
translations
  "âœ±x|P. t" => "CONST Mul_Quant (Î»x. t) {x. P}"


subsubsection â€¹Rewritesâ€º

lemma sep_quant_sing[simp, Ï†safe_simp]:
  â€¹âœ± A {i} = A iâ€º
  unfolding Mul_Quant_def
  by simp

lemma sep_quant_empty[simp, Ï†safe_simp]:
  â€¹âœ± A {} = 1â€º
  unfolding Mul_Quant_def
  by simp

lemma sep_quant_insert:
  â€¹i âˆ‰ I âŸ¹ âœ± A (insert i I) = A i * âœ± A Iâ€º
  unfolding Mul_Quant_def
  by (clarsimp simp add: Subjection_eq)

lemma sep_quant_reindex:
  â€¹ inj_on f I
âŸ¹ âœ±iâˆˆf`I. A i â‰¡ âœ±iâˆˆI. A (f i)â€º
  unfolding Mul_Quant_def BI_eq_iff atomize_eq
  by (clarsimp; rule; clarsimp simp add: finite_image_iff prod.reindex_cong)

lemma finite_prod_subjection:
  â€¹finite I âŸ¹ (âˆiâˆˆI. A i ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P i) = ((âˆiâˆˆI. A i) ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ (âˆ€iâˆˆI. P i))â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
proof (clarify; rule; clarsimp)
  fix u
  assume â€¹finite Iâ€º
  have â€¹u âŠ¨ (âˆiâˆˆI. A i ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P i) âŸ¶ u âŠ¨ prod A I âˆ§ (âˆ€xâˆˆI. P x)â€º
    by (induct arbitrary: u rule: finite_induct[OF â€¹finite Iâ€º]; simp; blast)
  moreover assume â€¹u âŠ¨ (âˆiâˆˆI. A i ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P i)â€º
  ultimately show â€¹u âŠ¨ prod A I âˆ§ (âˆ€xâˆˆI. P x)â€º
    by blast
qed 

lemma sep_quant_subjection[Ï†programming_base_simps, Ï†programming_simps, Ï†safe_simp]:
  â€¹(âœ±iâˆˆI. A i ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P i) = ((âœ±iâˆˆI. A i) ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ (âˆ€iâˆˆI. P i))â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
  by (clarify; rule; clarsimp simp add: Mul_Quant_def finite_prod_subjection)

lemma sep_quant_ExBI[Ï†programming_base_simps, Ï†programming_simps, Ï†safe_simp]:
  â€¹(âœ±iâˆˆI. âˆƒ*j. A i j) = (âˆƒ*j. âœ±iâˆˆI. A i (j i))â€º
proof -
  have t1: â€¹â‹€u. finite I âŸ¹ u âŠ¨ (âˆiâˆˆI. ExBI (A i)) âŸ· (âˆƒx. u âŠ¨ (âˆiâˆˆI. A i (x i)))â€º (is â€¹â‹€u. _ âŸ¹ ?goal uâ€º)
  proof -
    fix u
    assume â€¹finite Iâ€º
    show â€¹?goal uâ€º
      apply (induct arbitrary: u rule: finite_induct[OF â€¹finite Iâ€º]; clarsimp)
      apply (rule; clarsimp)
      subgoal for x F xa ua v xb
        by (rule exI[where x=â€¹Î»i. if i = x then xa else xb iâ€º], rule exI[where x=ua], rule exI[where x=v],
            simp, smt (verit) prod.cong)
      by blast
  qed
  show ?thesis
    unfolding BI_eq_iff Mul_Quant_def
    by (clarsimp; rule; clarsimp simp add: t1)
qed

lemma sep_quant_swap:
  â€¹âŸ¦ finite I; finite J âŸ§ âŸ¹(âœ±iâˆˆI. âœ±jâˆˆJ. A i j) = (âœ±jâˆˆJ. âœ±iâˆˆI. A i j)â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff Mul_Quant_def
  by (clarsimp; metis prod.swap)

lemma sep_quant_scalar_assoc:
  â€¹(âœ±iâˆˆI. âœ±jâˆˆJ. A i j) = ((âœ±(i,j) âˆˆ I Ã— J. A i j) ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ finite I)â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff Mul_Quant_def
  by (clarsimp; rule;
      clarsimp simp add: finite_prod_subjection ex_in_conv finite_cartesian_product_iff;
      cases â€¹I = {}â€º; cases â€¹J = {}â€º; simp add: prod.cartesian_product)

lemma sep_quant_sep:
  â€¹(âœ±iâˆˆI. A i) * (âœ±iâˆˆI. B i) = (âœ±iâˆˆI. A i * B i)â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff Mul_Quant_def
  proof (clarsimp; rule; clarify)
    fix u ua v
    assume â€¹finite Iâ€º
    show â€¹ua âŠ¨ prod A I âŸ¹ v âŠ¨ prod B I âŸ¹ ua ## v âŸ¹ ua * v âŠ¨ (âˆiâˆˆI. A i * B i)â€º
      by (induct arbitrary: v u ua rule: finite_induct[OF â€¹finite Iâ€º] ; clarsimp ;
          smt (verit, best) sep_disj_commuteI sep_disj_multD1 sep_disj_multI1 sep_mult_assoc sep_mult_commute)
  next
    fix u
    assume â€¹finite Iâ€º
    show â€¹u âŠ¨ (âˆiâˆˆI. A i * B i) âŸ¹ âˆƒua v. u = ua * v âˆ§ ua âŠ¨ prod A I âˆ§ v âŠ¨ prod B I âˆ§ ua ## vâ€º
      by (induct arbitrary: u rule: finite_induct[OF â€¹finite Iâ€º] ; clarsimp ;
          smt (verit) sep_disj_commuteI sep_disj_multD1 sep_disj_multI1 sep_mult_assoc sep_mult_commute)
qed

lemma sep_quant_merge_additive_disj:
  â€¹(âœ±iâˆˆI. A i) + (âœ±iâˆˆI. B i) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (âœ±iâˆˆI. A i + B i)â€º
  â€• â€¹but not held reverselyâ€º
unfolding Transformation_def Mul_Quant_def
proof (clarsimp; rule; clarsimp)
  fix v
  assume â€¹finite Iâ€º
  show â€¹v âŠ¨ prod A I âŸ¹ v âŠ¨ (âˆiâˆˆI. A i + B i)â€º
    by (induct arbitrary: v rule: finite_induct[OF â€¹finite Iâ€º]; clarsimp; blast)
next
  fix v
  assume â€¹finite Iâ€º
  show â€¹v âŠ¨ prod B I âŸ¹ v âŠ¨ (âˆiâˆˆI. A i + B i)â€º
    by (induct arbitrary: v rule: finite_induct[OF â€¹finite Iâ€º]; clarsimp; blast)
qed

lemma sep_quant_scalar_distr:
  â€¹I âˆ© J = {} âŸ¹ (âœ±iâˆˆI. A i) * (âœ±jâˆˆJ. B j) = (âœ±kâˆˆI + J. (if k âˆˆ J then B k else A k))â€º (*TODO: syntax priority!*)
  unfolding Mul_Quant_def plus_set_def Subjection_times Subjection_Subjection
  by (clarsimp simp add: Subjection_eq,
      smt (verit) disjoint_iff prod.cong prod.union_disjoint)


subsubsection â€¹Basic Rulesâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %cutting]:
  â€¹ (â‹€iâˆˆS. A i ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ P i)
âŸ¹ (âœ±iâˆˆS. A i) ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ (âˆ€iâˆˆS. P i) â€º
  unfolding Mul_Quant_def Action_Tag_def Satisfiable_def meta_Ball_def Premise_def ğ—‹EIF_def
  by clarsimp (metis dvdE dvd_prodI sep_conj_expn)


subsubsection â€¹Transformationâ€º

paragraph â€¹Reductionâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red]:
  â€¹ A x ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ (âœ±iâˆˆ{x}. A i) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red]:
  â€¹ 1 ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ (âœ±iâˆˆ{}. A i) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red]:
  â€¹ A x * R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ (âœ±iâˆˆ{x}. A i) * R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red]:
  â€¹ R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ (âœ±iâˆˆ{}. A i) * R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red]:
  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A x ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (âœ±iâˆˆ{x}. A i) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red]:
  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ 1 ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (âœ±iâˆˆ{}. A i) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red]:
  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A x ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (âœ±iâˆˆ{x}. A i) ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red]:
  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ 1 ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (âœ±iâˆˆ{}. A i) ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  by simp


paragraph â€¹Weak Normalizationâ€º

text â€¹Source side is normalized by merging separations together
        â€¹(âœ±iâˆˆI. A i) * (âœ±iâˆˆI. B i) âŸ¶ (âœ±iâˆˆI. A i * B i)â€º
  while the target side is normalized by splitting sep-quants into small separations
        â€¹(âœ±iâˆˆI. A i * B i) âŸ¶ (âœ±iâˆˆI. A i) * (âœ±iâˆˆI. B i)â€º.
  It is because our reasoning strategy is splitting the target side first and scanning the source
    side Ï†-type-by-type for each separated individual â€¹Ï†â€º-type items.
  The first step works in assertion form while the second step is between Ï†-types.
  The â€¹âœ±â€º is in assertion level, so the target side has to be split before the first step.
  Before the second step, for each individual target item â€¹(âœ±iâˆˆI. x â¦‚ T)â€º we shall apply
    â€¹sep_quant_transformationâ€º to strip off the outer â€¹âœ±â€º in order to enter inside into Ï†-type level
    so that the second step can continue.
  This â€¹sep_quant_transformationâ€º may fail and if it fails, there is no way to enter the second step
    âˆ—â€¹in this unfinished reasoning mechanism right nowâ€º.

  Later after the type embedding of â€¹âœ±â€º is completed, the reasoning of â€¹âœ±â€º will be forwarded to the
  type embedding which provides full power of competence on that level.
â€º

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_weak_red]:
  â€¹ (âœ±iâˆˆI. A i * B i) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ (âœ±iâˆˆI. A i) * (âœ±iâˆˆI. B i) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  unfolding sep_quant_sep
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_weak_red]:
  â€¹ (âœ±iâˆˆI. A i * B i) * W ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ (âœ±iâˆˆI. A i) * (âœ±iâˆˆI. B i) * W ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  unfolding sep_quant_sep[symmetric]
  by (simp add: mult.assoc)

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_weak_red]:
  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (âœ±iâˆˆI. A i) * (âœ±iâˆˆI. B i) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (âœ±iâˆˆI. A i * B i) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P â€º
  unfolding sep_quant_sep
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_weak_red]:
  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (âœ±iâˆˆI. A i) * (âœ±iâˆˆI. B i) * R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (âœ±iâˆˆI. A i * B i) * R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P â€º
  unfolding sep_quant_sep
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_weak_red]:
  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (âœ±iâˆˆI. A i) * (âœ±iâˆˆI. B i) ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (âœ±iâˆˆI. A i * B i) ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P â€º
  unfolding sep_quant_sep
  by simp




paragraph â€¹Transformation Functorâ€º

lemma sep_quant_transformation[Ï†reason %ToA_cut]:
  â€¹ ğ—€ğ—ğ–ºğ—‹ğ–½ ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ I = J
âŸ¹ (â‹€iâˆˆI. A i ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B i ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P i)
âŸ¹ (âœ±iâˆˆI. A i) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (âœ±iâˆˆJ. B i) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— (âˆ€iâˆˆI. P i) â€º
  unfolding Transformation_def Mul_Quant_def meta_Ball_def Premise_def ğ—‹Guard_def
  proof clarsimp
    fix v
    assume â€¹finite Jâ€º
    show â€¹ (â‹€x. x âˆˆ J âŸ¹ âˆ€v. v âŠ¨ A x âŸ¶ v âŠ¨ B x âˆ§ P x)
        âŸ¹ v âŠ¨ prod A J âŸ¹ v âŠ¨ prod B J âˆ§ (âˆ€xâˆˆJ. P x) â€º 
      by (induct arbitrary: v rule: finite_induct[OF â€¹finite Jâ€º]; clarsimp; blast)
  qed


lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_cut]:
  â€¹ ğ—€ğ—ğ–ºğ—‹ğ–½ ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ I = J
âŸ¹ (â‹€iâˆˆJ. A i ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B i ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R i ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P i)
âŸ¹ (âœ±iâˆˆJ. R i) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ RR @clean
âŸ¹ (âœ±iâˆˆI. A i) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (âœ±iâˆˆJ. B i) ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ RR ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— (âˆ€iâˆˆJ. P i) â€º
  unfolding REMAINS_def Premise_def ğ—‹Guard_def Action_Tag_def
  subgoal premises prems proof -
    have t1: â€¹(âœ±iâˆˆI. A i) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (âœ±iâˆˆJ. B i) * (âœ±iâˆˆJ. R i) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— (âˆ€iâˆˆJ. P i)â€º
      by (insert prems, simp add: sep_quant_sep sep_quant_transformation[unfolded Premise_def ğ—‹Guard_def])
    show ?thesis
      using mk_intro_transformation prems(3) t1 transformation_left_frame by blast
  qed .

thm transformation_trans[OF sep_quant_transformation, where Q=True, simplified]

paragraph â€¹Scalar Associativeâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_normalizing]:
  â€¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ finite I âŸ¹ (âœ±(i,j) âˆˆ I Ã— J. A i j) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P)
âŸ¹ (âœ±iâˆˆI. âœ±jâˆˆJ. A i j) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P â€º
  unfolding sep_quant_scalar_assoc Premise_def Subjection_transformation_rewr
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_normalizing]:
  â€¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ finite I âŸ¹ (âœ±(i,j) âˆˆ I Ã— J. A i j) * R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P)
âŸ¹ (âœ±iâˆˆI. âœ±jâˆˆJ. A i j) * R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P â€º
  unfolding sep_quant_scalar_assoc Premise_def Subjection_transformation_rewr Subjection_times
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_normalizing]:
  â€¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (âœ±(i,j) âˆˆ I Ã— J. B i j) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ ğ—‰ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ—‚ğ—Œğ–¾ finite I
âŸ¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (âœ±iâˆˆI. âœ±jâˆˆJ. B i j) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P â€º
  unfolding sep_quant_scalar_assoc Premise_def
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_normalizing]:
  â€¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (âœ±(i,j) âˆˆ I Ã— J. B i j) ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ ğ—‰ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ—‚ğ—Œğ–¾ finite I
âŸ¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (âœ±iâˆˆI. âœ±jâˆˆJ. B i j) ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P â€º
  unfolding sep_quant_scalar_assoc Premise_def
  by simp





subsection â€¹Universal Quantificationâ€º

term inf

definition AllSet :: â€¹('a â‡’ 'b BI) â‡’ 'b BIâ€º (binder "âˆ€â‡©Bâ‡©I" 10)
  where â€¹AllSet X = BI {y. âˆ€x. y âŠ¨ X x}â€º

lemma AllSet_expn[simp, Ï†expns]:
  â€¹p âŠ¨ (âˆ€â‡©Bâ‡©Ix. B x) âŸ· (âˆ€x. p âŠ¨ B x)â€º
  unfolding AllSet_def Satisfaction_def by simp

lemma AllSet_sub:
  â€¹A â‰¤ (âˆ€â‡©Bâ‡©I x. B x) âŸ· (âˆ€x. A â‰¤ B x)â€º
  unfolding AllSet_def
  by (cases A; rule; simp add: subset_iff BI_sub_iff)

lemma BI_All_comm:
  â€¹(âˆ€â‡©Bâ‡©I x y. A x y) = (âˆ€â‡©Bâ‡©I y x. A x y)â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
  by (simp, blast)

lemma [elim!]:
  â€¹Satisfiable (AllSet S) âŸ¹ (Satisfiable (S x) âŸ¹ C) âŸ¹ Câ€º
  unfolding Satisfiable_def
  by clarsimp blast

lemma [Ï†inhabitance_rule 1000]:
  â€¹ S x ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ C
âŸ¹ AllSet S ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ C â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def ğ—‹EIF_def
  by clarsimp blast


subsection â€¹Supplementary Connectiveâ€º

subsubsection â€¹World Shiftâ€º â€• â€¹Functional refinement in assertion-level, functional counterpart of â€¹â¨¾â€ºâ€º

definition World_Shift :: â€¹('c â‡’ 'd) â‡’ 'c BI â‡’ 'd BIâ€º ("Î¨[_]" [10] 1000)
  where â€¹(Î¨[Ïˆ] S) = BI {Ïˆ u |u. u âŠ¨ S}â€º
  â€• â€¹applying a function â€¹Ïˆâ€º (usually a homomorphism) to the concrete objects (namely Kripke world)
      characterized by an assertion.â€º

text â€¹Some thinking, what if we extend â€¹Ïˆâ€º to be a relation instead of a function? Then â€¹Î¨[Ïˆ]â€º
  actually becomes the assertion-level counterpart of the Ï†-type â€¹â¨¾â€º. However, the difficulty is
  I cannot find the relational extension of closed homomorphism that gives us distributivity over
  â€¹*â€º like â€¹Î¨_Multiplicative_Conjâ€º.â€º

lemma World_Shift_expn[Ï†expns, simp]:
  â€¹p âŠ¨ Î¨[Ïˆ] S âŸ· (âˆƒu. p = Ïˆ u âˆ§ u âŠ¨ S)â€º
  unfolding World_Shift_def Satisfaction_def
  by clarsimp


text â€¹The motivation of such modality is it is used later in Domainoid Extractionâ€º

paragraph â€¹Rewrites \& Transformationsâ€º

lemma Î¨_1:
  â€¹ homo_one Ïˆ
âŸ¹ Î¨[Ïˆ] 1 = 1 â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff homo_one_def
  by simp

lemma Î¨_0:
  â€¹ Î¨[Ïˆ] 0 = 0 â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
  by clarsimp

lemma
  â€¹ Î¨[Ïˆ] (A âŠ“ B) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (Î¨[Ïˆ] A âŠ“ Î¨[Ïˆ] B) â€º
  unfolding Transformation_def
  by (clarsimp; blast)

lemma Î¨_Multiplicative_Conj:
  â€¹ closed_homo_sep Ïˆ
âŸ¹ Î¨[Ïˆ] (A * B) = Î¨[Ïˆ] A * Î¨[Ïˆ] Bâ€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
  by (clarsimp simp add: closed_homo_sep_def closed_homo_sep_disj_def homo_sep_def
                         homo_sep_mult_def; rule; clarsimp; metis)

lemma Î¨_Mul_Quant:
  â€¹ closed_homo_sep Ïˆ
âŸ¹ homo_one Ïˆ
âŸ¹ Î¨[Ïˆ] (âœ±iâˆˆS. A i) = (âœ±iâˆˆS. Î¨[Ïˆ] (A i)) â€º
proof -
  assume â€¹closed_homo_sep Ïˆâ€º and â€¹homo_one Ïˆâ€º
  { assume â€¹finite Sâ€º
    have â€¹Î¨[Ïˆ] (âˆiâˆˆS. A i) = (âˆiâˆˆS. Î¨[Ïˆ] (A i))â€º
      by (induct rule: finite_induct[OF â€¹finite Sâ€º];
          simp add: Î¨_1 â€¹closed_homo_sep Ïˆâ€º â€¹homo_one Ïˆâ€º Î¨_Multiplicative_Conj)
  }
  then show â€¹Î¨[Ïˆ] (âœ±iâˆˆS. A i) = (âœ±iâˆˆS. Î¨[Ïˆ] (A i))â€º
    unfolding Mul_Quant_def
    by (smt (verit, best) Subjection_Flase Subjection_True Î¨_0)
qed

lemma Î¨_Additive_Disj:
  â€¹Î¨[d] (A + B) = Î¨[d] A + Î¨[d] Bâ€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
  by (clarsimp; metis)

lemma Î¨_ExBI:
  â€¹Î¨[d] (âˆƒ*c. S c) = (âˆƒ*c. Î¨[d] (S c))â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
  by (clarsimp; metis)

lemma Î¨_Subjection:
  â€¹Î¨[d] (S ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P) = (Î¨[d] S ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P)â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
  by (clarsimp; metis)


section â€¹Basic Ï†-Types \& Embedding of Logic Connectivesâ€º

subsection â€¹Identity Ï†-Typeâ€º

definition Itself :: " ('a,'a) Ï† " where "Itself x = BI {x}"

lemma Itself_expn[Ï†expns, iff]:
  "p âŠ¨ (x â¦‚ Itself) âŸ· p = x"
  unfolding Ï†Type_def Itself_def Satisfaction_def by auto

lemma Itself_expn'[Ï†expns, iff]:
  "p âŠ¨ (Itself x) âŸ· p = x"
  unfolding Itself_def Satisfaction_def by auto

lemma Itself_inhabited_E[elim!]:
  â€¹ Satisfiable (x â¦‚ Itself) âŸ¹ C âŸ¹ C â€º .

lemma Itself_inhabited[Ï†reason %cutting, simp, intro!]:
  â€¹ Satisfiable (x â¦‚ Itself) â€º
  unfolding Satisfiable_def
  by blast

lemma [Ï†reason %cutting]:
  â€¹ Abstract_Domain Itself (Î»_. True) â€º
  unfolding Abstract_Domain_def ğ—‹EIF_def Satisfiable_def
  by clarsimp

lemma [Ï†reason %abstract_domain]:
  â€¹ Abstract_Domainâ‡©L Itself (Î»_. True) â€º
  unfolding Abstract_Domainâ‡©L_def ğ—‹ESC_def Satisfiable_def
  by simp

lemma Itself_E:
  â€¹ ğ—‰ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ—‚ğ—Œğ–¾ v âŠ¨ (x â¦‚ T) âŸ¹ v â¦‚ Itself ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ x â¦‚ T â€º
  unfolding Transformation_def Premise_def by simp

text â€¹The introduction rule of Itself cannot be written in such âˆƒfree-ToA form but in To-Transformation form.â€º

lemma satisfication_encoding:
  â€¹ (x â¦‚ Itself ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P) âŸ· x âŠ¨ (y â¦‚ T) âˆ§ P â€º
  unfolding Transformation_def by simp


subsubsection â€¹Construction from Raw Abstraction represented by Itself â€º
  â€• â€¹is a sort of reasoning process useful later in making initial Hoare triples from semantic raw
      representation (which are represented by Itself, i.e., no abstraction).â€º

Ï†reasoner_group abstract_from_raw = (100, [16, 1399]) for â€¹v â¦‚ Itself ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ x â¦‚ Tâ€º
      > ToA_bottom and < ToA_splitting_target
      â€¹Rules constructing abstraction from raw representationsâ€º
  and abstract_from_raw_cut = (1000, [1000, 1030]) for â€¹v â¦‚ Itself ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ x â¦‚ Tâ€º in abstract_from_raw
      â€¹Cutting rules constructing abstraction from raw representationsâ€º
  and derived_abstract_from_raw = (70, [60,80]) for â€¹v â¦‚ Itself ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ x â¦‚ Tâ€º
                                                 in abstract_from_raw and < abstract_from_raw_cut
      â€¹Derived rulesâ€º

declare [[Ï†reason_default_pattern
      â€¹ _ â¦‚ Itself ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ â¦‚ ?T ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’« â€º â‡’ â€¹ _ â¦‚ Itself ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ â¦‚ ?T ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’« â€º (1120)
  and â€¹ _ â¦‚ Itself ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ?A ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’« â€º â‡’ â€¹ _ â¦‚ Itself ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ?A ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’« â€º (1110)
]]

declare Itself_E[Ï†reason default %ToA_falling_latice]

lemma [Ï†reason default %ToA_falling_latice+1 except â€¹?var â¦‚ Itself ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º]:
  â€¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ c = c' âŸ¹ c' â¦‚ Itself ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A)
âŸ¹ ğ—‰ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ—‚ğ—Œğ–¾ c = c'
âŸ¹ c â¦‚ Itself ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A â€º
  unfolding Premise_def
  by simp

declare [[Ï†chk_source_val = false]]

lemma [Ï†reason %abstract_from_raw_cut]:
  â€¹ câ‡©a â¦‚ Itself ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A
âŸ¹ câ‡©b â¦‚ Itself ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B
âŸ¹ ğ—‰ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ—‚ğ—Œğ–¾ câ‡©a ## câ‡©b
âŸ¹ (câ‡©a * câ‡©b) â¦‚ Itself ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A * Bâ€º
  unfolding Transformation_def Premise_def
  by (clarsimp; blast)

declare [[Ï†chk_source_val = true]]



subsection â€¹Embedding of â€¹âŠ¤â€ºâ€º

  â€¹(x â¦‚ âŠ¤â‡©Ï†) = âŠ¤â€º
  unfolding Ï†Any_def Ï†Type_def ..

  â€¹p âŠ¨ (x â¦‚ âŠ¤â‡©Ï†) âŸ· Trueâ€º

  by simp

paragraph â€¹Separation Extractionâ€º

text â€¹In ToA, the â€¹âŠ¤â‡©Ï†â€º behaviors like a wildcard that can absorb an undetermined number of Ï†-type items,
  and which Ï†-type items are absorbed cannot be determined just from the type information. Therefore,
  we require explicit annotations to be given to give the range of the absorption of â€¹âŠ¤â‡©Ï†â€º.

TODO: make such annotation syntax.
â€º

  â€¹ May_Assign (snd x) unspec
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ T âœ¼ â—‹ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ((), unspec) â¦‚ âŠ¤â‡©Ï† âœ¼ â—‹ â€º
  for T :: â€¹('c::sep_magma_1, 'x) Ï†â€º
  unfolding Transformation_def Ï†Prod'_def
  by clarsimp

subsection â€¹Embedding of Separation Conjunctionâ€º

lemma Ï†Prod_expn' [Ï†programming_base_simps, Ï†programming_simps, Ï†safe_simp]:
  â€¹((a,b) â¦‚ A âˆ— B) = (a â¦‚ A) * (b â¦‚ B)â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff by (simp add: set_mult_expn) blast

lemma Ï†Prod_expn'':
  â€¹ NO_MATCH (xx,yy) x
âŸ¹ (x â¦‚ A âˆ— B) = (fst x â¦‚ A) * (snd x â¦‚ B)â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff by (cases x; simp add: set_mult_expn) blast

bundle Ï†Prod_expn = Ï†Prod_expn'[simp] Ï†Prod_expn''[simp]

subsubsection â€¹Basic Rulesâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %extract_pure]:
  â€¹ fst x â¦‚ T1 ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ C1
âŸ¹ snd x â¦‚ T2 ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ C2
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ T1 âˆ— T2 ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ C1 âˆ§ C2â€º
  unfolding Satisfiable_def Action_Tag_def ğ—‹EIF_def
  by (cases x; simp, blast)

paragraph â€¹Frame Rulesâ€º

lemma transformation_right_frame_ty:
  â€¹(â‹€a. ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ a = fst x âŸ¹ a â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ f(a) â¦‚ U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P(a))
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ T âˆ— R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ apfst f x â¦‚ U âˆ— R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P(fst x) â€º
  unfolding Transformation_def
  by (cases x; clarsimp; blast)

lemma transformation_left_frame_ty:
  â€¹(â‹€a. ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ a = snd x âŸ¹ a â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ f(a) â¦‚ U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P(a))
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ R âˆ— T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ apsnd f x â¦‚ R âˆ— U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P(snd x) â€º
  unfolding Transformation_def
  by (cases x; clarsimp; blast)

subsubsection â€¹Abstract Domainâ€º

text â€¹The upper bound of the abstraction domain is simple.â€º
(*
lemma â€• â€¹will be derived laterâ€º:
  â€¹ Abstract_Domain T Dâ‡©T
âŸ¹ Abstract_Domain U Dâ‡©U
âŸ¹ Abstract_Domain (T âˆ— U) (Î»(x,y). Dâ‡©T x âˆ§ Dâ‡©U y) â€º
  unfolding Abstract_Domain_def Action_Tag_def Satisfiable_def
  by (clarsimp, blast)
*)

text â€¹However, the lower bound is non-trivial, in which case we have to show the separation combination
  is compatible between the two Ï†-types. The compatibility is encoded by predicate â€¹Separation_Disjâ‡©Ïˆâ€º
  and â€¹Separation_Disjâ‡©Ï†â€º which are solved by means of the domainoid introduced later.
  So the rules are given until \cref{phi-types/Domainoid/App}.
â€º


subsubsection â€¹Transformation Rulesâ€º

lemma destruct_Ï†Prod_Ï†app: (*TODO: merge this into general destruction*)
  â€¹x â¦‚ T âˆ— U ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (fst x â¦‚ T) * (snd x â¦‚ U)â€º
  by (cases x; simp add: Transformation_def set_mult_expn) blast

lemma Ï†Prod_transformation:
  " x â¦‚ N ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ x' â¦‚ N' ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pa
âŸ¹ y â¦‚ M ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y' â¦‚ M' ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pb
âŸ¹ (x,y) â¦‚ N âˆ— M ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (x',y') â¦‚ N' âˆ— M' ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pa âˆ§ Pb"
  unfolding Transformation_def by simp blast
  (*The rule is not added into the Ï†-LPR because such product is solved by Structural Extract*)

paragraph â€¹Reductionâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red]:
  " A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (fst x â¦‚ N) * (snd x â¦‚ M) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ x â¦‚ N âˆ— M ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P"
  by (cases x; simp add: Ï†Prod_expn')

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red+1 for â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (_,_) â¦‚ _ âˆ— _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º
                              â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ?var_y â¦‚ _ âˆ— _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º]:
  " A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (x â¦‚ N) * (y â¦‚ M) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (x,y) â¦‚ N âˆ— M ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P"
  by (simp add: Ï†Prod_expn')

text â€¹The reductions on source are not enabled as they may break the form of original source assertionâ€º

paragraph â€¹Separation Extractionâ€º

text â€¹see Â§â€¹Technical Ï†-Types required in Reasoning Transformation/Separation Extraction of â€¹Ï†â€ºProdâ€ºâ€º

lemma Structural_Extract_Ï†Prod_a [Ï†reason %ToA_cut except â€¹(_ :: ?'a::sep_semigroup BI) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'â€º]:
      â€• â€¹merely the rule for non-semigroup algebras.
          for others, see Â§â€¹Technical Ï†-Types required in Reasoning Transformation/Separation Extraction of â€¹Ï†â€ºProdâ€ºâ€º
  â€¹ fst a â¦‚ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ b â¦‚ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«
âŸ¹ a â¦‚ A âœ¼ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ((b, snd a), unspec) â¦‚ (Y âˆ— X) âœ¼ â—‹ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«' â€º
  for A :: â€¹('c::sep_magma_1, 'x) Ï†â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def Transformation_def Ï†Prod'_def
  by clarsimp blast


subsection â€¹Embedding of Emptyâ€º

subsubsection â€¹Rewritesâ€º

lemma Ï†None_itself_is_one[simp, Ï†safe_simp]:
  â€¹(any â¦‚ Ï†None) = 1â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff by simp

lemma Ï†Prod_Ï†None:
  â€¹((x',y) â¦‚ â—‹ âˆ— U) = ((y â¦‚ U) :: 'a::sep_magma_1 BI)â€º
  â€¹((x,y') â¦‚ T âˆ— â—‹) = ((x â¦‚ T) :: 'b::sep_magma_1 BI)â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
  by (simp_all add: set_mult_expn)


subsubsection â€¹Transformation Rulesâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red]:
  " H ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ H ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (any â¦‚ â—‹) * X ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P "
  for X :: â€¹'a::sep_magma_1 BIâ€º
  unfolding mult_1_left Ï†None_itself_is_one .

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red]:
  " H ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ H ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (any â¦‚ â—‹) * X ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P"
  for X :: â€¹'a::sep_magma_1 BIâ€º
  unfolding mult_1_left Ï†None_itself_is_one .

  " R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ (any â¦‚ â—‹) * R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P "
  for X :: â€¹'a::sep_magma_1 BIâ€º
  unfolding mult_1_left Ï†None_itself_is_one .

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_success]:
  â€¹X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ any â¦‚ â—‹ ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ Xâ€º
  for X :: â€¹'a::sep_magma_1 BIâ€º
  unfolding REMAINS_def Action_Tag_def by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red for â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ â¦‚ â—‹ ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º]:
  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ 1 ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ â—‹ ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’« â€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red]:
  â€¹ 1 ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ â—‹ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P â€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red]:
  â€¹ W ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ (x â¦‚ â—‹) * W ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P â€º
  for W :: â€¹'c::sep_magma_1 BIâ€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_success]:
  â€¹ x â¦‚ â—‹ âœ¼ U ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (snd x, unspec) â¦‚ U âœ¼ â—‹ â€º
  unfolding Ï†Prod'_def
  by (cases x; simp add: Ï†Prod_expn')

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_success]:
  â€¹ x â¦‚ T âœ¼ â—‹ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (unspec, fst x) â¦‚ â—‹ âœ¼ T â€º
  unfolding Ï†Prod'_def
  by (cases x; simp add: Ï†Prod_expn')


subsection â€¹Injection into Unital Algebraâ€º

definition Ï†Some :: â€¹('v, 'x) Ï† â‡’ ('v option, 'x) Ï†â€º ("â— _" [91] 90)
  where â€¹â— T = (Î»x. Some `â‡©I (x â¦‚ T))â€º

lemma Ï†Some_expn[simp, Ï†expns]:
  â€¹p âŠ¨ (x â¦‚ â— T) âŸ· (âˆƒv. p = Some v âˆ§ v âŠ¨ (x â¦‚ T))â€º
  unfolding Ï†Type_def Ï†Some_def
  by simp

subsubsection â€¹Rewritesâ€º

lemma Ï†Some_Ï†Prod:
  â€¹ â— T âˆ— â— U = â— (T âˆ— U) â€º
  by (rule Ï†Type_eqI; clarsimp; force)

lemma Ï†Some_eq_term_strip:
  â€¹ (x â¦‚ â— T) = (y â¦‚ â— U) â‰¡ (x â¦‚ T) = (y â¦‚ U) â€º
  unfolding atomize_eq BI_eq_iff
  by clarsimp blast
  


subsubsection â€¹Transformation Rulesâ€º

lemma Ï†Some_transformation_strip:
  â€¹ x â¦‚ â— T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ â— U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P â‰¡ x â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P â€º
  unfolding atomize_eq Transformation_def
  by clarsimp blast

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_cut]:
  â€¹ x â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ â— T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ â— U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P â€º
  unfolding Ï†Some_transformation_strip .

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_cut]:
  â€¹ x â¦‚ T âœ¼ W ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ U âœ¼ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ â— T âœ¼ â— W ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ â— U âœ¼ â— R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  by (simp add: Ï†Some_Ï†Prod Ï†Some_transformation_strip Ï†Prod'_def)

subsubsection â€¹Propertiesâ€º â€• â€¹Some properties have to be given early before derivers readyâ€º

lemma Abstract_Domain_Ï†Some[Ï†reason %abstract_domain]:
  â€¹ Abstract_Domain T D
âŸ¹ Abstract_Domain (â— T) D â€º
  unfolding Abstract_Domain_def ğ—‹EIF_def Satisfiable_def
  by clarsimp



subsubsection â€¹Conditional Emptyâ€º

definition Ï†Cond_Unital :: â€¹bool â‡’ ('v, 'x) Ï† â‡’ ('v::sep_magma_1, 'x) Ï†â€º ("â—’[_] _" [20,91] 90)
  â€• â€¹Conditional Unital Insertionâ€º
  where â€¹â—’[C] T = (if C then T else â—‹)â€º

definition Ï†Cond_UniIns :: â€¹bool â‡’ ('v, 'x) Ï† â‡’ ('v option, 'x) Ï†â€º ("â—‘[_] _" [20,91] 90)
  â€• â€¹Conditional Unital Insertionâ€º
  where â€¹â—‘[C] T = (if C then â— T else â—‹)â€º


paragraph â€¹Rewritesâ€º

lemma Ï†Cond_Unital_unfold_simp[simp, Ï†safe_simp]:
  â€¹ â—’[True] T â‰¡ T â€º
  â€¹ â—’[False] T â‰¡ â—‹ â€º
  unfolding Ï†Cond_Unital_def
  by simp+

lemma Ï†Cond_UniIns_unfold_simp[simp, Ï†safe_simp]:
  â€¹ â—‘[True]  T â‰¡ â— T â€º
  â€¹ â—‘[False] T â‰¡ â—‹ â€º
  unfolding Ï†Cond_UniIns_def
  by simp+

lemma Ï†Cond_Unital_expn[simp, Ï†expns]:
  â€¹ p âŠ¨ (x â¦‚ â—’[C] T) âŸ· (if C then p âŠ¨ (x â¦‚ T) else p = None) â€º
  by clarsimp

lemma Ï†Cond_UniIns_expn[simp, Ï†expns]:
  â€¹ p âŠ¨ (x â¦‚ â—‘[C] T) âŸ· (if C then p âŠ¨ (x â¦‚ â— T) else p = None) â€º
  by clarsimp

lemma Ï†Cond_Unital_Prod:
  â€¹â—’[C] T âˆ— â—’[C] U â‰¡ â—’[C] (T âˆ— U)â€º
  unfolding atomize_eq
  by (rule Ï†Type_eqI; cases C; clarsimp)

lemma Ï†Cond_UniIns_Prod:
  â€¹â—‘[C] T âˆ— â—‘[C] U â‰¡ â—‘[C] (T âˆ— U)â€º
  unfolding atomize_eq
  by (rule Ï†Type_eqI; cases C; clarsimp; force)

lemma Ï†Cond_Unital_trans_rewr:
  â€¹ x â¦‚ â—’[C] T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ â—’[C] U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— C âŸ¶ P â‰¡ C âŸ¶ (x â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P) â€º
  unfolding atomize_eq Transformation_def
  by (cases C; clarsimp; blast)


section â€¹Basic Ï†-Type Propertiesâ€º

text â€¹The two properties are essential for reasoning the general transformation including separation extraction.â€º


subsection â€¹Identity Element I\&Eâ€º

definition Identity_Elementâ‡©I :: â€¹'a::one BI â‡’ bool â‡’ boolâ€º where â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©I S P âŸ· (S ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ 1 ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P)â€º
definition Identity_Elementâ‡©E :: â€¹'a::one BI â‡’ boolâ€º where â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©E S âŸ· (1 ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ S)â€º

definition Identity_Elementsâ‡©I :: â€¹('c::one,'a) Ï† â‡’ ('a â‡’ bool) â‡’ ('a â‡’ bool) â‡’ boolâ€º
  where â€¹Identity_Elementsâ‡©I T D P âŸ· (âˆ€x. D x âŸ¶ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (x â¦‚ T) (P x))â€º

definition Identity_Elementsâ‡©E :: â€¹('c::one,'a) Ï† â‡’ ('a â‡’ bool) â‡’ boolâ€º
  where â€¹Identity_Elementsâ‡©E T D âŸ· (âˆ€x. D x âŸ¶ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (x â¦‚ T))â€º

definition Identity_Elements :: â€¹('c::one,'a) Ï† â‡’ ('a â‡’ bool) â‡’ boolâ€º
  where â€¹Identity_Elements T D âŸ· Identity_Elementsâ‡©I T D (Î»_. True) âˆ§ Identity_Elementsâ‡©E T Dâ€º

lemma Identity_Elements_alt_def:
  â€¹Identity_Elements T D âŸ· (âˆ€x. D x âŸ¶ (x â¦‚ T) = 1)â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elements_def Identity_Elementsâ‡©I_def Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def
            Identity_Elementsâ‡©E_def Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def BI_eq_ToA
  by (rule; clarsimp)
  

definition Hint_Identity_Element :: â€¹('c::one,'a) Ï† â‡’ 'a â‡’ boolâ€º
  where â€¹Hint_Identity_Element T one â‰¡ Trueâ€º
  â€• â€¹a pure syntactical hintâ€º

declare [[ Ï†reason_default_pattern
      â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©I ?S _â€º â‡’ â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©I ?S _â€º (100)
  and â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©I (_ â¦‚ ?T) _â€º â‡’ â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©I (_ â¦‚ ?T) _â€º (110)
  and â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©E ?Sâ€º â‡’ â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©E ?Sâ€º (100)
  and â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©E (_ â¦‚ ?T)â€º â‡’ â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©E (_ â¦‚ ?T)â€º (110)

  and â€¹Identity_Elementsâ‡©I ?T _ _â€º â‡’ â€¹Identity_Elementsâ‡©I ?T _ _â€º (100)
  and â€¹Identity_Elementsâ‡©E ?T _â€º â‡’ â€¹Identity_Elementsâ‡©E ?T _â€º (100)

  and â€¹Hint_Identity_Element ?T _â€º â‡’ â€¹Hint_Identity_Element ?T _â€º (100)
  and â€¹Identity_Elements ?T _â€º â‡’ â€¹Identity_Elements ?T _â€º (100)
]]

Ï†reasoner_group identity_element = (100,[1,3000]) for (â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©I _ _â€º, â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©E _â€º)
    â€¹Reasoning rules deducing if the given assertion can transform to or be transformed from the
     assertion of identity element.â€º
 and identity_element_fallback = (1,[1,1]) for (â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©I _ _â€º, â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©E _â€º)
     in identity_element > fail
    â€¹Fallbacks of reasoning Identity_Element.â€º
 and identity_element_Ï† = (10, [10, 11]) for (â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©I _ _â€º, â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©E _â€º)
    â€¹Turning to â€¹Identity_Elementsâ‡©Iâ€º and â€¹Identity_Elementsâ‡©Eâ€ºâ€º
 and derived_identity_element = (50, [50,55]) for (â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©I _ _â€º, â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©E _â€º)
     in identity_element > identity_element_Ï†
    â€¹Automatically derived Identity_Element rulesâ€º
 and identity_element_top = (2900, [2900,2999]) in identity_element â€¹topâ€º
 and identity_element_cut = (1000, [1000,1029]) for (â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©I _ _â€º, â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©E _â€º)
     in identity_element > derived_identity_element < identity_element_top
    â€¹Cutting rules for Identity_Elementâ€º
 and identity_element_OPEN_MAKE = (1100, [1100,1100]) in identity_element
     and > identity_element_cut < identity_element_top â€¹â€º
 and identity_element_red = (2500, [2500, 2530]) for (â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©I _ _â€º, â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©E _â€º)
     in identity_element > identity_element_cut
    â€¹Literal Reductionâ€º
 and identity_element_ToA = (50, [50,51]) for â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _â€º in ToA
    â€¹Entry points from ToA to Identity_Elementâ€º

 and identity_element_hint = (1000, [10, 2000]) for â€¹Hint_Identity_Element T ieâ€º
    â€¹syntactical hints suggesting an identity element of the given Ï†-typeâ€º

subsubsection â€¹Extracting Pure Factsâ€º

paragraph â€¹Identity_Elementâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %extract_pure]:
  â€¹ ğ—‹ESC Q (Satisfiable S)
âŸ¹ ğ—‹EIF (Identity_Elementâ‡©I S P) (Q âŸ¶ P) â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def ğ—‹ESC_def ğ—‹EIF_def Transformation_def Satisfiable_def
  by blast

lemma [Ï†reason %extract_pure]:
  â€¹ ğ—‹EIF (Satisfiable S) P
âŸ¹ ğ—‹EIF (Identity_Elementâ‡©E S) P â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def ğ—‹ESC_def ğ—‹EIF_def Transformation_def Satisfiable_def
  by blast

lemma Identity_Elementâ‡©I_ğ’œEIF_sat:
  â€¹ ğ—‹EIF (Identity_Elementâ‡©I S P) (âˆ€v. v âŠ¨ S âŸ¶ v = 1 âˆ§ P) â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def ğ—‹EIF_def Transformation_def
  by blast

lemma Identity_Elementâ‡©I_ğ’œESC_sat:
  â€¹ ğ—‹ESC (âˆ€v. v âŠ¨ S âŸ¶ v = 1 âˆ§ P) (Identity_Elementâ‡©I S P) â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def ğ—‹ESC_def Transformation_def
  by blast

lemma Identity_Elementâ‡©E_ğ’œEIF_sat:
  â€¹ ğ—‹EIF (Identity_Elementâ‡©E S) (1 âŠ¨ S) â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def ğ—‹EIF_def Transformation_def
  by blast

lemma Identity_Elementâ‡©E_ğ’œESC_sat:
  â€¹ ğ—‹ESC (1 âŠ¨ S) (Identity_Elementâ‡©E S) â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def ğ—‹ESC_def Transformation_def
  by blast

bundle Identity_Elementâ‡©I_sat = Identity_Elementâ‡©I_ğ’œEIF_sat [Ï†reason %extract_pure_sat]
                               Identity_Elementâ‡©I_ğ’œESC_sat [Ï†reason %extract_pure_sat]
bundle Identity_Elementâ‡©E_sat = Identity_Elementâ‡©E_ğ’œEIF_sat [Ï†reason %extract_pure_sat]
                               Identity_Elementâ‡©E_ğ’œESC_sat [Ï†reason %extract_pure_sat]

bundle Identity_Element_sat begin
  unbundle Identity_Elementâ‡©I_sat Identity_Elementâ‡©E_sat
end


paragraph â€¹Identity_Elementsâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %extract_pure]:
  â€¹ (â‹€x. ğ—‹EIF (Identity_Elementâ‡©I (x â¦‚ T) (P x)) (Q x))
âŸ¹ ğ—‹EIF (Identity_Elementsâ‡©I T D P) (âˆ€x. D x âŸ¶ Q x)â€º
  unfolding ğ—‹EIF_def Identity_Elementsâ‡©I_def
  by clarsimp

lemma [Ï†reason %extract_pure]:
  â€¹ (â‹€x. ğ—‹EIF (Identity_Elementâ‡©E (x â¦‚ T)) (Q x))
âŸ¹ ğ—‹EIF (Identity_Elementsâ‡©E T D) (âˆ€x. D x âŸ¶ Q x) â€º
  unfolding ğ—‹EIF_def Identity_Elementsâ‡©E_def
  by clarsimp

subsubsection â€¹System Rulesâ€º

lemma Identity_Elementsâ‡©I_sub:
  â€¹ D' â‰¤ D
âŸ¹ P â‰¤ P'
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I T D P 
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I T D' P' â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementsâ‡©I_def Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def Transformation_def
  by (clarsimp simp add: le_fun_def; blast)

lemma [Ï†reason %cutting]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I T Dâ‡©I P
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©E T Dâ‡©E
âŸ¹ Identity_Elements T (Î»x. Dâ‡©I x âˆ§ Dâ‡©E x) â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elements_def
  by (smt (verit, best) Identity_Elementsâ‡©E_def Identity_Elementsâ‡©I_sub predicate1I)


subsubsection â€¹Fallbackâ€º

  â€¹ TRACE_FAIL TEXT(â€¹Fail to showâ€º (S ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ 1))
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I S Any â€º
  unfolding TRACE_FAIL_def
  by blast

lemma [Ï†reason default %fail]:
  â€¹ TRACE_FAIL TEXT(â€¹Fail to showâ€º (1 ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ S))
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E S â€º
  unfolding TRACE_FAIL_def
  by blast

  â€¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I T (Î»_. False) (Î»_. True) â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementsâ‡©I_def
  by blast

  â€¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©E T (Î»_. False) â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementsâ‡©E_def
  by blast

  â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©I 0 Trueâ€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def by simp

                                         â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©E ?varâ€º ]:
  â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©E 1â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def by simp

                                         â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©I ?var _â€º ]:
  â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©I 1 Trueâ€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def by simp

  â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©E (any â¦‚ â—‹)â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def by simp

  â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©I (any â¦‚ â—‹) Trueâ€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def by simp


subsubsection â€¹Special Formsâ€º

  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I X Any
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I X True â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def Transformation_def
  by simp

  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I X P
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (Ï†TagA mode X) P â€º
  unfolding Ï†TagA_def .

  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E X
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (Ï†TagA mode X) â€º
  unfolding Ï†TagA_def .

subparagraph â€¹Reductionâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_red]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I A P
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (If True A B) P â€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_red]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I B P
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (If False A B) P â€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_red]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E A
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (If True A B) â€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_red]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E B
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (If False A B) â€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_red]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I A D P
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I (If True A B) D P â€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_red]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I B D P
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I (If False A B) D P â€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_red]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©E A D
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©E (If True A B) D â€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_red]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©E B D
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©E (If False A B) D â€º
  by simp


subparagraph â€¹Normalizingâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (If C (x â¦‚ A) (x â¦‚ B)) P
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (x â¦‚ If C A B) Pâ€º
  by (cases C; simp)

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (If C (x â¦‚ A) (x â¦‚ B))
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (x â¦‚ If C A B)â€º
  by (cases C; simp)

subparagraph â€¹Case Splitâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]:
  â€¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡  C âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I A Dâ‡©A Pâ‡©A)
âŸ¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ Â¬C âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I B Dâ‡©B Pâ‡©B)
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I (If C A B) (if C then Dâ‡©A else Dâ‡©B) (if C then Pâ‡©A else Pâ‡©B) â€º
  by (cases C; simp)

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]:
  â€¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡  C âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©E (If C A B) Dâ‡©A)
âŸ¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ Â¬C âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©E (If C A B) Dâ‡©B)
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©E (If C A B) (If C Dâ‡©A Dâ‡©B)â€º
  by (cases C; simp)

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]:
  â€¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ C âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I A Pa)
âŸ¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ Â¬ C âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I B Pb)
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (If C A B) (If C Pa Pb) â€º
  by (cases C; simp)

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]:
  â€¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ C âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E A)
âŸ¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ Â¬ C âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E B)
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (If C A B) â€º
  by (cases C; simp)

paragraph â€¹Case Split of Sum Typeâ€º

subparagraph â€¹Reductionâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_red]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (A a)
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (case_sum A B (Inl a)) â€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_red]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (B b)
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (case_sum A B (Inr b)) â€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_red]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (A a) P
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (case_sum A B (Inl a)) P â€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_red]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (B b) P
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (case_sum A B (Inr b)) P â€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_red]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©E (A a) D
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©E (case_sum A B (Inl a)) D â€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_red]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©E (B b) D
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©E (case_sum A B (Inr b)) D â€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_red]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I (A a) D P
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I (case_sum A B (Inl a)) D P â€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_red]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I (B b) D P
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I (case_sum A B (Inr b)) D P â€º
  by simp

subparagraph â€¹Case Splitâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]:
  â€¹ (â‹€a. ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ x = Inl a âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (A a) (P a))
âŸ¹ (â‹€b. ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ x = Inr b âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (B b) (Q b))
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (case_sum A B x) (pred_sum P Q x) â€º
  unfolding Premise_def
  by (cases x; clarsimp)

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]:
  â€¹ (â‹€a. ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ x = Inl a âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (A a))
âŸ¹ (â‹€b. ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ x = Inr b âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (B b))
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (case_sum A B x) â€º
  unfolding Premise_def
  by (cases x; clarsimp)

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]:
  â€¹ (â‹€a. ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ x = Inl a âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I (A a) (Dâ‡©A a) (P a))
âŸ¹ (â‹€b. ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ x = Inr b âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I (B b) (Dâ‡©B b) (Q b))
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I (case_sum A B x) (case_sum Dâ‡©A Dâ‡©B x) (case_sum P Q x) â€º
  unfolding Premise_def
  by (cases x; clarsimp)

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]:
  â€¹ (â‹€a. ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ x = Inl a âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©E (A a) (Dâ‡©A a))
âŸ¹ (â‹€b. ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ x = Inr b âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©E (B b) (Dâ‡©B b))
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©E (case_sum A B x) (case_sum Dâ‡©A Dâ‡©B x) â€º
  unfolding Premise_def
  by (cases x; clarsimp)

âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ unspec â¦‚ â—‹ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’« â€º

  â€¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I Itself (Î»x. x = 1) (Î»_. True) â€º

  by clarsimp

  â€¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©E Itself (Î»x. x = 1) â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def Identity_Elementsâ‡©E_def Transformation_def
  by clarsimp

lemma [Ï†reason no explorative backtrack %identity_element_Ï†]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I T D P
âŸ¹ ğ—‰ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ—‚ğ—Œğ–¾ D x
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (x â¦‚ T) (P x) â€º

  using transformation_trans by fastforce

âŸ¹ Hint_Identity_Element T x âˆ¨â‡©câ‡©uâ‡©t True
âŸ¹ ğ—‰ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ—‚ğ—Œğ–¾ D x

            Orelse_shortcut_def Ant_Seq_def

lemma [Ï†reason no explorative backtrack %identity_element_Ï†]:

âŸ¹ ğ—‰ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ—‚ğ—Œğ–¾ D x
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (x â¦‚ T) â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def Identity_Elementsâ‡©E_def Premise_def
  using transformation_trans by fastforce

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I A P1
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I B P2
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (A + B) (P1 âˆ¨ P2)â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def Transformation_def
  by simp

lemma (*The above rule is local complete*)
  â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©I (A + B) P âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I A P âˆ§ Identity_Elementâ‡©I B Pâ€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def Transformation_def
  by clarsimp

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E A âˆ¨ Identity_Elementâ‡©E B
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (A + B)â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def Transformation_def
  by clarsimp

lemma (*The above rule is not local complete*)
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (A + B) âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E A âˆ§ Identity_Elementâ‡©E Bâ€º
  oops

  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (A x) P
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (AllSet A) Pâ€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def
  by (metis AllSet_expn Transformation_def)
(*The rule is not local complete*)

  â€¹ (â‹€x. Identity_Elementâ‡©E (A x))
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (AllSet A)â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def
  by (metis AllSet_expn Transformation_def)

lemma (*The above rule is local complete*)
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (AllSet A) âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (A x) â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def Transformation_def
  by clarsimp

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]:
  â€¹(â‹€x. Identity_Elementâ‡©I (A x) (P x))

  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def Transformation_def

  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (A x)
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (ExBI A)â€º

  â€¹Identity_Elementâ‡©E (ExBI A) âŸ¹ âˆƒx. Identity_Elementâ‡©E (A x)â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def Transformation_def ExBI_expn
  by clarsimp

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]:
  â€¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ P âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I A Q)
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (A ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P) (P âˆ§ Q)â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def Transformation_def
  by (simp; blast)

lemma
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (A ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P) (P âˆ§ Q) âŸ¹ (P âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I A Q)â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def Transformation_def Satisfiable_def
  by (cases P; clarsimp)

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E A
âŸ¹ ğ—‰ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ—‚ğ—Œğ–¾ P
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (A ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P)â€º

  by (clarsimp; blast)

lemma (*The above rule is local complete*)
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (A ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P) âŸ¹ P âˆ§ Identity_Elementâ‡©E A â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def Transformation_def Premise_def
  by (clarsimp; blast)

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]: 
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I A P
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I B Q
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (A * B) (P âˆ§ Q) â€º
  for A :: â€¹'a::sep_magma_1 BIâ€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def Transformation_def
  by (clarsimp simp add: set_mult_expn, insert mult_1_class.mult_1_left; blast)
  (* It is not complete, example: algebra {e,a} where the sep conjunction is only defined
     on the unit, x ## y âŸ· x = e âˆ§ y = e.
     Let A = B = {e,a}, we have A * B = {e}. Both A B are not stateless but A * B is. *)

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]: 
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E A
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E B
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (A * B) â€º
  for A :: â€¹'a::sep_magma_1 BIâ€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def Transformation_def
  by (clarsimp, insert mult_1_class.mult_1_left sep_magma_1_left, blast)

lemma (*the above rule is not local complete*)
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (A * B) âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E A âˆ§ Identity_Elementâ‡©E B â€º
  for A :: â€¹'a::sep_magma_1 BIâ€º
  oops

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I T Dâ‡©T P
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I U Dâ‡©U Q
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I (T âˆ— U) (Î»(x,y). Dâ‡©T x âˆ§ Dâ‡©U y) (Î»(x,y). P x âˆ§ Q y)â€º
  for T :: â€¹('a::sep_magma_1, 'b) Ï†â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def Identity_Elementsâ‡©I_def Ï†Prod_expn' Transformation_def
  by (simp add: set_mult_expn, insert mult_1_class.mult_1_left, blast)

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]: 
  â€¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©E T Dâ‡©T
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©E U Dâ‡©U
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©E (T âˆ— U) (Î»(x,y). Dâ‡©T x âˆ§ Dâ‡©U y) â€º
  for T :: â€¹'a â‡’ 'b::sep_magma_1 BIâ€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def Identity_Elementsâ‡©E_def Transformation_def
  by (clarsimp simp add: Ï†Prod_expn', insert set_mult_expn, fastforce)


lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]: 
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E A
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E B
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (A ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ B) â€º

  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def Transformation_def REMAINS_def
