lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I A P
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I B Q
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (A ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ B) (P âˆ§ Q) â€º
  for A :: â€¹'a::sep_magma_1 BIâ€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def Transformation_def Premise_def REMAINS_def
  by (clarsimp, insert mult_1_class.mult_1_right, blast)


lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]: 
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E A
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E B
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (A âŠ“ B) â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def Transformation_def
  by (clarsimp)

lemma (*the above rule is local complete*)
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (A âŠ“ B) âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E A âˆ§ Identity_Elementâ‡©E B â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def Transformation_def
  by (clarsimp)

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I A P âˆ¨ Identity_Elementâ‡©I B Q
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (A âŠ“ B) (P âˆ¨ Q)â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def Transformation_def
  by (clarsimp, blast)

lemma (*the above rule is not local complete*)
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (A âŠ“ B) True âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I A True âˆ¨ Identity_Elementâ‡©I B True â€º
  oops
  (* Auto Quickcheck found a counterexample:
  A = {aâ‡©3}
  B = {aâ‡©1} *)

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]:
  â€¹ (â‹€iâˆˆI. Identity_Elementâ‡©I (A i) (P i))
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (âœ±iâˆˆI. A i) (âˆ€iâˆˆI. P i)â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def Mul_Quant_def Transformation_def meta_Ball_def Premise_def
proof clarsimp
  fix v
  assume prems: â€¹(â‹€i. i âˆˆ I âŸ¹ âˆ€v. v âŠ¨ A i âŸ¶ v = 1 âˆ§ P i)â€º
                â€¹v âŠ¨ prod A Iâ€º
     and â€¹finite Iâ€º
  show â€¹v = 1 âˆ§ (âˆ€xâˆˆI. P x)â€º
    by (insert prems; induct rule: finite_induct[OF â€¹finite Iâ€º]; clarsimp; fastforce)
qed

lemma [Ï†reason %identity_element_cut]:
  â€¹ (â‹€iâˆˆS. Identity_Elementâ‡©E (A i))
âŸ¹ ğ—‰ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ—‚ğ—Œğ–¾ finite S
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (âœ±iâˆˆS. A i) â€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def Mul_Quant_def Transformation_def Premise_def meta_Ball_def
proof clarsimp
  fix v
  assume prems: â€¹(â‹€i. i âˆˆ S âŸ¹ 1 âŠ¨ A i)â€º
     and â€¹finite Sâ€º
  show â€¹1 âŠ¨ prod A Sâ€º
    by (insert prems;
        induct rule: finite_induct[OF â€¹finite Sâ€º];
        clarsimp;
        (insert mult_1_class.mult_1_left sep_magma_1_right, blast))
qed


subsection â€¹Equivalence of Objectsâ€º

definition Object_Equiv :: â€¹('c,'a) Ï† â‡’ ('a â‡’ 'a â‡’ bool) â‡’ boolâ€º
  where â€¹Object_Equiv T eq âŸ· (âˆ€x. eq x x) âˆ§ (âˆ€x y. eq x y âŸ¶ (x â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ T))â€º

text â€¹Ï†-Deriver usually derives the object reachability relation of Ï†-type operators generally
  for any variable type operand, but the reachability can be wider on specific type operands, such
  as the reachability â€¹Î»x y. Trueâ€º of â€¹List(â—‹)â€º versus the version â€¹Î»x y. length x = length yâ€º instantiated
  from the general rule â€¹Object_Equiv T eq âŸ¹ Object_Equiv (List T) (list_rel eq)â€º by substituting
  â€¹Tâ€º for â€¹â—‹â€º and â€¹eqâ€º for â€¹(=)â€º.

  These special `singular` cases are hard to be handled by Ï†-type algebra who provides a general automation,
  thus demanding user rules for override. Even so, common singular cases can still be handled by ad-hoc
  optimization in the algorithm.

  Generally, when an instantiation of a type operand yields a trivial type relating empty concrete objects,
  a singular case can occur. Therefore, when we infer the reachability of a given type, we can first
  check if it is such a trivial type and if so we derive the wider relation by rule (see â€¹ğ’œ_singular_unitâ€º).
  In this way, the overall reasoning can still be powerful even when such common singular cases are not considered.


(paper)
â€º

declare [[
  Ï†reason_default_pattern â€¹Object_Equiv ?T _â€º â‡’ â€¹Object_Equiv ?T _â€º (100),
  Ï†premise_attribute once? [Ï†reason? %local] for â€¹Object_Equiv _ _â€º       (%Ï†attr)
]]

Ï†reasoner_group object_equiv = (100, [1, 3999]) for â€¹Object_Equiv T eqâ€º
    â€¹Reasoning rules giving the equivalence relation (though is actually a reachability
     relation) of objects of the given Ï†-type.â€º
 and object_equiv_cut = (%cutting, [%cutting, %cutting+10]) for â€¹Object_Equiv T eqâ€º in object_equiv
    â€¹Cutting rules for reasonig Object_Equivâ€º
 and derived_object_equiv = (50, [50,50]) for â€¹Object_Equiv T eqâ€º in object_equiv and < object_equiv_cut
    â€¹Automatically derived rules for Object_Equivâ€º
 and object_equiv_fallback = (1, [1,1]) for â€¹Object_Equiv T eqâ€º in object_equiv and < derived_object_equiv
    â€¹Fallback rules for reasonig Object_Equivâ€º

subsubsection â€¹Variantsâ€º

consts ğ’œ_singular_unit :: action

declare [[
  Ï†reason_default_pattern â€¹Object_Equiv ?T _ @tag ğ’œ_singular_unitâ€º â‡’
                          â€¹Object_Equiv ?T _ @tag ğ’œ_singular_unitâ€º (100)
]]

lemma [Ï†reason %object_equiv_cut+1]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©I T Dâ‡©I P
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementsâ‡©E T Dâ‡©E
âŸ¹ Object_Equiv T eq
âŸ¹ Object_Equiv T (Î»x y. eq x y âˆ¨ Dâ‡©I x âˆ§ (P x âŸ¶ Dâ‡©E y)) @tag ğ’œ_singular_unit â€º
  unfolding Object_Equiv_def Identity_Elementsâ‡©E_def Identity_Elementsâ‡©I_def Action_Tag_def
            Transformation_def Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def
  by clarsimp blast

lemma [Ï†reason %object_equiv_cut]: â€• â€¹for non-unital algebrasâ€º
  â€¹ Object_Equiv T eq
âŸ¹ Object_Equiv T eq @tag ğ’œ_singular_unit â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by clarsimp



subsubsection â€¹Extracting Pure Factsâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %extract_pure]:
  â€¹ (â‹€x y. ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ eq x y âŸ¹ ğ—‹EIF (x â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ T) (P x y) )
âŸ¹ ğ—‹EIF (Object_Equiv T eq) ((âˆ€x. eq x x) âˆ§ (âˆ€x y. eq x y âŸ¶ P x y))â€º
  unfolding ğ—‹EIF_def Object_Equiv_def Premise_def Transformation_def
  by clarsimp

lemma [Ï†reason %extract_pure]:
  â€¹ (â‹€x y. ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ eq x y âŸ¹ ğ—‹ESC (P x y) (x â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ T))
âŸ¹ ğ—‹ESC ((âˆ€x. eq x x) âˆ§ (âˆ€x y. eq x y âŸ¶ P x y)) (Object_Equiv T eq) â€º
  unfolding ğ—‹ESC_def Object_Equiv_def Premise_def Transformation_def
  by clarsimp


subsubsection â€¹Reasoning Rulesâ€º

lemma Object_Equiv_fallback[Ï†reason default %object_equiv_fallback]:
  â€¹Object_Equiv T (=)â€º
  unfolding Object_Equiv_def by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %object_equiv_cut]:
  â€¹ Object_Equiv â—‹ (Î»_ _. True) â€º
  unfolding Object_Equiv_def Transformation_def
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %object_equiv_cut]:
  â€¹ Object_Equiv T eq
âŸ¹ Object_Equiv (â— T) eq â€º
  unfolding Object_Equiv_def Transformation_def
  by auto

lemma [Ï†reason %object_equiv_cut]:
  â€¹ (â‹€a. Object_Equiv (Î»x. S x a) (R a))
âŸ¹ Object_Equiv (Î»x. ExBI (S x)) (Î»x y. âˆ€a. R a x y) â€º
  unfolding Object_Equiv_def Transformation_def Ï†Type_def
  by (clarsimp; blast)

lemma [Ï†reason %object_equiv_cut]:
  â€¹ Object_Equiv S R
âŸ¹ Object_Equiv (Î»x. S x ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P x) (Î»x y. P x âŸ¶ R x y âˆ§ P y) â€º
  unfolding Object_Equiv_def Transformation_def Ï†Type_def
  by clarsimp

lemma [Ï†reason %object_equiv_cut]:
  â€¹ Object_Equiv S1 R1
âŸ¹ Object_Equiv S2 R2
âŸ¹ Object_Equiv (Î»x. S1 x âŠ“ S2 x) (Î»x y. R1 x y âˆ§ R2 x y) â€º
  unfolding Object_Equiv_def Transformation_def Ï†Type_def
  by clarsimp

lemma [Ï†reason %object_equiv_cut]:
  â€¹ Object_Equiv S1 R1
âŸ¹ Object_Equiv S2 R2
âŸ¹ Object_Equiv (Î»x. S1 x + S2 x) (Î»x y. R1 x y âˆ§ R2 x y) â€º
  unfolding Object_Equiv_def Transformation_def Ï†Type_def
  by clarsimp

lemma [Ï†reason %object_equiv_cut]:
  â€¹ (â‹€a. Object_Equiv (Î»x. S x a) (R a))
âŸ¹ Object_Equiv (Î»x. AllSet (S x)) (Î»x y. âˆ€a. R a x y) â€º
  unfolding Object_Equiv_def Transformation_def Ï†Type_def
  by (clarsimp simp add: AllSet_expn; blast)

lemma [Ï†reason %object_equiv_cut]:
  â€¹ Object_Equiv S1 R1
âŸ¹ Object_Equiv S2 R2
âŸ¹ Object_Equiv (Î»x. S1 x * S2 x) (Î» x y. R1 x y âˆ§ R2 x y) â€º
  unfolding Object_Equiv_def Transformation_def Ï†Type_def
  by (clarsimp simp add: set_mult_expn; blast)

(* â€• â€¹derived automatically laterâ€º
lemma [Ï†reason %object_equiv_cut]:
  â€¹ Object_Equiv Tâ‡©a Eqâ‡©a
âŸ¹ Object_Equiv Tâ‡©b Eqâ‡©b
âŸ¹ Object_Equiv (Tâ‡©a âˆ— Tâ‡©b) (Î»(xâ‡©a, xâ‡©b) (yâ‡©a, yâ‡©b). Eqâ‡©a xâ‡©a yâ‡©a âˆ§ Eqâ‡©b xâ‡©b yâ‡©b) â€º
  unfolding Object_Equiv_def Transformation_def
  by (clarsimp simp add: set_mult_expn; blast)
*)

lemma
  â€¹ Object_Equiv S1 R1
âŸ¹ Object_Equiv S2 R2
âŸ¹ Object_Equiv (Î»x. BI {p. p âŠ¨ S1 x âŸ¶ p âŠ¨ S2 x}) (Î»x y. R1 y x âˆ§ R2 x y) â€º
  unfolding Object_Equiv_def Transformation_def Ï†Type_def
  by clarsimp

lemma [Ï†reason %object_equiv_cut]:
  â€¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ C âŸ¹ Object_Equiv A Ea)
âŸ¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ Â¬ C âŸ¹ Object_Equiv B Eb)
âŸ¹ Object_Equiv (if C then A else B) (if C then Ea else Eb) â€º
  unfolding Premise_def
  by (cases C; simp)

lemma Object_Equiv_Mul_Quant[Ï†reason %object_equiv_cut]:
  â€¹ (âˆ€i x. eq i x x)
âŸ¹ (â‹€iâˆˆS. Object_Equiv (Î»x. A x i) (eq i))
âŸ¹ Object_Equiv (Î»x. âœ±iâˆˆS. A x i) (Î»x y. âˆ€i. eq i x y)â€º
  unfolding Object_Equiv_def Transformation_def Ï†Type_def
            meta_Ball_def Premise_def Mul_Quant_def
  proof (clarsimp)
    fix x y v
    assume prems: â€¹(â‹€x. x âˆˆ S âŸ¹ âˆ€xa y. eq x xa y âŸ¶ (âˆ€v. v âŠ¨ A xa x âŸ¶ v âŠ¨ A y x))â€º
                  â€¹âˆ€i. eq i x yâ€º
                  â€¹v âŠ¨ prod (A x) Sâ€º
       and â€¹finite Sâ€º
    show â€¹v âŠ¨ prod (A y) Sâ€º
      by (insert prems;
          induct arbitrary: x y v rule: finite_induct[OF â€¹finite Sâ€º];
          clarsimp simp add: set_mult_expn;
          metis)
  qed


subsection â€¹Equivalent Classâ€º

definition â€¹Equiv_Class T r âŸ· (âˆ€v x y. v âŠ¨ T x âˆ§ v âŠ¨ T y âŸ¶ r x y )â€º

lemma Equiv_Class_alt_def:
  â€¹ Equiv_Class T r âŸ· (âˆ€v x y. v âŠ¨ (x â¦‚ T) âˆ§ v âŠ¨ (y â¦‚ T) âŸ¶ r x y) â€º
  unfolding Ï†Type_def Equiv_Class_def
  by simp

definition â€¹Injective_on T D âŸ· Equiv_Class T (Î»x y. x âˆˆ D âˆ§ y âˆˆ D âŸ¶ x = y)â€º


subsubsection â€¹Propertiesâ€º

definition concretize :: â€¹('c,'x) Ï† â‡’ 'x â‡’ 'câ€º
  where â€¹concretize T = (Î»x. @c. c âŠ¨ (x â¦‚ T))â€º

lemma concretize_SAT:
  â€¹ Satisfiable (x â¦‚ T)
âŸ¹ concretize T x âŠ¨ (x â¦‚ T) â€º
  unfolding concretize_def Satisfiable_def
  by (meson someI_ex)
  
lemma concretize_inj:
  â€¹ Injective_on T D
âŸ¹ Abstract_Domainâ‡©L T (Î»x. x âˆˆ D)
âŸ¹ inj_on (concretize T) D â€º
  unfolding inj_on_def Equiv_Class_def concretize_def Abstract_Domainâ‡©L_def ğ—‹ESC_def Satisfiable_def
            Ï†Type_def Injective_on_def
  by (auto, metis someI)



subsubsection â€¹Reasoning Configuresâ€º

Ï†reasoner_group Equiv_Class_all = (100, [10,3000]) â€¹â€º
  and Equiv_Class = (1000, [1000,1030]) in Equiv_Class_all â€¹â€º
  and Equiv_Class_default = (25, [10,50]) in Equiv_Class_all and < Equiv_Class â€¹â€º
  and Equiv_Class_derived = (75, [70, 80]) in Equiv_Class_all and < Equiv_Class and > Equiv_Class_default â€¹â€º

declare [[
  Ï†reason_default_pattern â€¹Equiv_Class ?T ?varâ€º â‡’ â€¹Equiv_Class ?T _â€º (100)
                      and â€¹Equiv_Class ?T _â€º â‡’ â€¹Equiv_Class ?T ?varâ€º (80),
  Ï†default_reasoner_group â€¹Equiv_Class _ _â€º : %Equiv_Class (100)
]]


subsubsection â€¹Reasoning Rulesâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %Equiv_Class]:
  â€¹ Equiv_Class T (Î»x y. x âˆˆ D âˆ§ y âˆˆ D âŸ¶ x = y)
âŸ¹ Injective_on T D â€º
  unfolding Injective_on_def
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason add]:
  â€¹ Equiv_Class (Î»x. A (fst x) (snd x)) (Î»(xâ‡©1,_) (xâ‡©2,_). r xâ‡©1 xâ‡©2)
âŸ¹ Equiv_Class (Î»x. ExBI (A x)) r â€º
  unfolding Equiv_Class_def
  by auto blast

lemma (*the above rule is the strongest*)
  â€¹ Equiv_Class (Î»x. ExBI (A x)) r
âŸ¹ Equiv_Class (Î»x. A (fst x) (snd x)) (Î»(xâ‡©1,_) (xâ‡©2,_). r xâ‡©1 xâ‡©2) â€º
  unfolding Equiv_Class_def
  by auto

lemma [Ï†reason add]:
  â€¹ Equiv_Class A (Î»x y. P x âˆ§ P y âŸ¶ r x y)
âŸ¹ Equiv_Class (Î»x. A x ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P x) r â€º
  unfolding Equiv_Class_def
  by auto

lemma (*the above rule is the strongest*)
  â€¹ Equiv_Class (Î»x. A x ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P x) r
âŸ¹ Equiv_Class A (Î»x y. P x âˆ§ P y âŸ¶ r x y) â€º
  unfolding Equiv_Class_def
  by auto

lemma [Ï†reason add]:
  â€¹ ğ—‰ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ—‚ğ—Œğ–¾ (âˆ€x. r x x)
âŸ¹ Equiv_Class Itself r â€º
  unfolding Equiv_Class_def Premise_def
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %Equiv_Class_default except â€¹Equiv_Class _ ?varâ€º ]:
  â€¹ Equiv_Class T r
âŸ¹ ğ—‰ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ—‚ğ—Œğ–¾ (âˆ€x y. r x y âŸ¶ r' x y)
âŸ¹ Equiv_Class T r' â€º
  unfolding Premise_def Equiv_Class_def
  by auto

lemma [Ï†reason add]:
  â€¹ Equiv_Class T (Î»x y. âˆ€x' y'. x = f x' âˆ§ y = f y' âŸ¶ r x' y')
âŸ¹ Equiv_Class (Î»x. f x â¦‚ T) r â€º
  unfolding Equiv_Class_def Ï†Type_def
  by auto

lemma (*the above rule is the strongest*)
  â€¹ Equiv_Class (Î»x. f x â¦‚ T) r
âŸ¹ Equiv_Class T (Î»x y. âˆ€x' y'. x = f x' âˆ§ y = f y' âŸ¶ r x' y') â€º
  unfolding Equiv_Class_def Ï†Type_def
  by auto

lemma [Ï†reason add]:
  â€¹ A ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ P
âŸ¹ ğ—‰ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ—‚ğ—Œğ–¾ (P âŸ¶ (âˆ€a b. r a b))
âŸ¹ Equiv_Class (Î»x. A) r â€º
  unfolding Equiv_Class_def Premise_def ğ—‹EIF_def Satisfiable_def
  by simp blast

lemma (*the above rule is the strongest*)
  â€¹ Equiv_Class (Î»x. A) r
âŸ¹ Satisfiable A
âŸ¹ âˆ€a b. r a b â€º
  unfolding Equiv_Class_def Satisfiable_def
  by auto

lemma [Ï†reason %ğ’œ_map_each_item]:

lemma [Ï†reason %ğ’œ_map_each_item]:

  unfolding Action_Tag_def Premise_def

  unfolding Action_Tag_def Premise_def

  unfolding Action_Tag_def .

  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason default %ToA_clean_fallback-5 for â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (_,_,_) â¦‚ _ @cleanâ€º]:
  â€¹ W ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ T @clean

  by simp

  by simp

subsubsection â€¹â€¹Î¨[Some]â€ºâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_clean_fallback for â€¹Î¨[Some] _ * Î¨[Some] _ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Î¨[Some] _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @cleanâ€º]:
  â€¹ Î¨[Some] X * Î¨[Some] Y ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Î¨[Some] (X * Y) @clean â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  using Transformation_def by fastforce


subsection â€¹Associative Multiplicationâ€º

definition â€¹ğ—‹Assoc_Mul A B C âŸ· ((A * B) * C = A * (B * C)) â€º

paragraph â€¹Basic Settingsâ€º

Ï†reasoner_group ğ—‹Assoc_Mul_all = (100, [10,3000]) for â€¹ğ—‹Assoc_Mul A B Câ€º â€¹â€º
  and ğ—‹Assoc_Mul = (1000, [1000,1030]) in ğ—‹Assoc_Mul_all â€¹â€º
  and ğ—‹Assoc_Mul_default = (20, [10, 50]) in ğ—‹Assoc_Mul_all and < ğ—‹Assoc_Mul â€¹â€º

declare [[
  Ï†default_reasoner_group â€¹ğ—‹Assoc_Mul _ _ _â€º : %ğ—‹Assoc_Mul (100)
]]

setup â€¹Sign.mandatory_path "ğ—‹Assoc_Mul"â€º

lemma "apply":
  â€¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul A B C
âŸ¹ A * B * C ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A * (B * C) â€º
  unfolding ğ—‹Assoc_Mul_def by simp

lemma "rev_apply":
  â€¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul A B C
âŸ¹ A * (B * C) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A * B * C â€º
  unfolding ğ—‹Assoc_Mul_def by simp

setup â€¹Sign.parent_pathâ€º

paragraph â€¹Reasoning Rulesâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason add]:
  â€¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul A B C â€º
  for A :: â€¹'a::semigroup_multâ€º
  unfolding ğ—‹Assoc_Mul_def
  by (simp add: mult.assoc)

lemma [Ï†reason add]:
  â€¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul 1 B C â€º
  â€¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul A 1 C â€º
  â€¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul A B 1 â€º
  for A :: â€¹'a::mult_1â€º
  unfolding ğ—‹Assoc_Mul_def
  by simp+

lemma [Ï†reason add]:
  â€¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul (x â¦‚ â—‹) B C â€º
  â€¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul A (x â¦‚ â—‹) C â€º
  â€¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul A B (x â¦‚ â—‹) â€º
  for A :: â€¹'a::sep_magma_1 BIâ€º
  unfolding ğ—‹Assoc_Mul_def
  by simp+

lemma [Ï†reason add]:
  â€¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul (x â¦‚ â—’[False] T) B C â€º
  â€¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul A (x â¦‚ â—’[False] T) C â€º
  â€¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul A B (x â¦‚ â—’[False] T) â€º
  for A :: â€¹'a::sep_magma_1 BIâ€º
  unfolding ğ—‹Assoc_Mul_def
  by simp+

lemma [Ï†reason add]:
  â€¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul (x â¦‚ T) B C
âŸ¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul (x â¦‚ â—’[True] T) B C â€º
  â€¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul A (x â¦‚ T) C
âŸ¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul A (x â¦‚ â—’[True] T) C â€º
  â€¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul A B (x â¦‚ T)
âŸ¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul A B (x â¦‚ â—’[True] T) â€º
  for A :: â€¹'a::sep_magma_1 BIâ€º
  unfolding ğ—‹Assoc_Mul_def
  by simp+



subsection â€¹Commutative Muiltiplicationâ€º

definition â€¹ğ—‹Comm_Mul A B âŸ· (A * B = B * A)â€º

paragraph â€¹Basic Settingsâ€º

Ï†reasoner_group ğ—‹Comm_Mul_all = (100, [10,3000]) for â€¹ğ—‹Comm_Mul A Bâ€º â€¹â€º
  and ğ—‹Comm_Mul = (1000, [1000,1030]) in ğ—‹Comm_Mul_all â€¹â€º
  and ğ—‹Comm_Mul_default = (20, [10, 50]) in ğ—‹Comm_Mul_all and < ğ—‹Comm_Mul â€¹â€º

declare [[
  Ï†default_reasoner_group â€¹ğ—‹Comm_Mul _ _â€º : %ğ—‹Comm_Mul (100)
]]

setup â€¹Sign.mandatory_path "ğ—‹Comm_Mul"â€º

  â€¹ ğ—‹Comm_Mul A B
âŸ¹ A * B ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B * A â€º

  â€¹ ğ—‹Comm_Mul B A
âŸ¹ A * B ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B * A â€º

subsubsection â€¹Separation Extraction of â€¹Ï†â€ºProdâ€º

text â€¹Using the technical auxiliaries, we can give the separation extraction for â€¹Ï†Prodâ€ºâ€º
 
lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_cut]:
  â€¹ (fst x, fst ww) â¦‚ A âœ¼ WY ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ b â¦‚ Y âœ¼ B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P1 @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'
âŸ¹ (snd b, snd ww) â¦‚ B âœ¼ WX ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ c â¦‚ X âœ¼ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P2 @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'
âŸ¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul (fst x â¦‚ A) (fst ww â¦‚ WY) (snd ww â¦‚ WX)
âŸ¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul (fst b â¦‚ Y) (snd b â¦‚ B) (snd ww â¦‚ WX)
âŸ¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul (fst b â¦‚ Y) (fst c â¦‚ X) (snd c â¦‚ R)
âŸ¹ snd x â¦‚ WW ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ww â¦‚ WY âˆ— WX @clean
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ A âœ¼ WW ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ((fst b, fst c), snd c) â¦‚ (Y âˆ— X) âœ¼ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— (P1 âˆ§ P2) @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'â€º
  for A :: â€¹('a::sep_magma_1,'b) Ï†â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def Try_def Ï†Prod'_def ğ—‹Assoc_Mul_def
  apply (clarsimp simp add: Ï†Prod_expn'' Ï†Prod_expn')
  subgoal premises prems
    by (insert prems(1)[THEN transformation_right_frame, where R=â€¹snd ww â¦‚ WXâ€º]
               prems(2)[THEN transformation_left_frame, where R=â€¹fst b â¦‚ Yâ€º]
               prems(3)[symmetric]
               prems(4)[symmetric]
               prems(5)[symmetric]
               prems(6)[THEN transformation_left_frame, where R=â€¹fst x â¦‚ Aâ€º],
           cases b, simp,
           insert mk_elim_transformation transformation_trans, blast) .

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_cut+1]:
  â€¹ (fst x, fst ww) â¦‚ A âœ¼ WY ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ b â¦‚ Y âœ¼ B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P1 @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'
âŸ¹ (snd b, snd ww) â¦‚ B âœ¼ WX ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ c â¦‚ X âœ¼ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P2 @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'
âŸ¹ snd x â¦‚ WW ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ww â¦‚ WY âˆ— WX @clean
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ A âœ¼ WW ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ((fst b, fst c), snd c) â¦‚ (Y âˆ— X) âœ¼ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— (P1 âˆ§ P2) @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'â€º
  for A :: â€¹('a::sep_monoid,'b) Ï†â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def Try_def Ï†Prod'_def
  apply (clarsimp simp add: Ï†Prod_expn'' Ï†Prod_expn')
  subgoal premises prems
    by (insert prems(1)[THEN transformation_right_frame, where R=â€¹snd ww â¦‚ WXâ€º]
               prems(2)[THEN transformation_left_frame, where R=â€¹fst b â¦‚ Yâ€º]
               prems(3)[THEN transformation_left_frame, where R=â€¹fst x â¦‚ Aâ€º],
           cases b, simp add: mult.assoc,
           insert mk_elim_transformation transformation_trans, blast) .

lemma [Ï†reason add]:
  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ wx â¦‚ WX @clean
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (unspec, wx) â¦‚ â—‹ âˆ— WX @clean â€º
  for WX :: â€¹('c::sep_magma_1, 'x) Ï†â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by (clarsimp simp add: Ï†Prod_expn'' Ï†Prod_expn')

lemma [Ï†reason add]:
  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ wy â¦‚ WY @clean
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (wy, unspec) â¦‚ WY âˆ— â—‹ @clean â€º
  for WY :: â€¹('c::sep_magma_1, 'x) Ï†â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by (clarsimp simp add: Ï†Prod_expn'' Ï†Prod_expn')


lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_cut]:
  â€¹ (fst (fst x), fst wr) â¦‚ T âœ¼ W ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ yr â¦‚ Y âœ¼ Rt ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P1 @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'
âŸ¹ apfst snd x â¦‚ U âœ¼ W2 ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ wr â¦‚ W âœ¼ Ru ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P2 @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'
âŸ¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul (fst (fst x) â¦‚ T) (snd (fst x) â¦‚ U ) (snd x â¦‚ W2)
âŸ¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul (fst (fst x) â¦‚ T) (fst wr â¦‚ W ) (snd wr â¦‚ Ru)
âŸ¹ ğ—‹Assoc_Mul (fst yr â¦‚ Y) (snd yr â¦‚ Rt) (snd wr â¦‚ Ru)
âŸ¹ (snd yr, snd wr) â¦‚ Rt âˆ— Ru ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ rr â¦‚ RR @clean
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ (T âˆ— U) âœ¼ W2 ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (fst yr, rr) â¦‚ Y âœ¼ RR ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P1 âˆ§ P2 @tag ğ’¯ğ’«' â€º
  for T :: â€¹('a::sep_magma_1,'b) Ï†â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def Try_def Ï†Prod'_def ğ—‹Assoc_Mul_def
  apply (simp add: Ï†Prod_expn'' Ï†Prod_expn' Ï†Some_Ï†Prod[symmetric])
  subgoal premises prems
    by (insert prems(1)[THEN transformation_right_frame, where R=â€¹snd wr â¦‚ Ruâ€º]
               prems(2)[THEN transformation_left_frame, where R=â€¹fst (fst x) â¦‚ Tâ€º]
               prems(3)[symmetric]
               prems(4)[symmetric]
               prems(5)[symmetric]
               prems(6)[THEN transformation_left_frame, where R=â€¹(fst yr â¦‚ Y)â€º],
        simp,
        smt (z3) mk_elim_transformation mk_intro_transformation transformation_weaken) .

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_cut+1]:
  â€¹ (fst (fst x), fst wr) â¦‚ T âœ¼ W ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ yr â¦‚ Y âœ¼ Rt ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P1 @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'
âŸ¹ apfst snd x â¦‚ U âœ¼ W2 ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ wr â¦‚ W âœ¼ Ru ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P2 @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'
âŸ¹ (snd yr, snd wr) â¦‚ Rt âˆ— Ru ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ rr â¦‚ RR @clean
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ (T âˆ— U) âœ¼ W2 ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (fst yr, rr) â¦‚ Y âœ¼ RR ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P1 âˆ§ P2 @tag ğ’¯ğ’«' â€º
  for T :: â€¹('a::sep_monoid,'b) Ï†â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def Try_def Ï†Prod'_def
  apply (simp add: Ï†Prod_expn'' Ï†Prod_expn' Ï†Some_Ï†Prod[symmetric])
  subgoal premises prems
    by (insert prems(1)[THEN transformation_right_frame, where R=â€¹snd wr â¦‚ Ruâ€º]
               prems(2)[THEN transformation_left_frame, where R=â€¹fst (fst x) â¦‚ Tâ€º]
               prems(3)[THEN transformation_left_frame, where R=â€¹(fst yr â¦‚ Y)â€º],
        simp add: mult.assoc[symmetric],
        smt (z3) transformation_trans transformation_weaken) .

lemma [Ï†reason add]:
  â€¹ snd x â¦‚ Rb ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y @clean
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ â—‹ âˆ— Rb ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y @clean â€º
  for Rb :: â€¹('c::sep_magma_1, 'b) Ï†â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by (clarsimp simp add: Ï†Prod_expn'' Ï†Prod_expn')

lemma [Ï†reason add]:
  â€¹ fst x â¦‚ Ra ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y @clean
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ Ra âˆ— â—‹ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y @clean â€º
  for Ra :: â€¹('c::sep_magma_1, 'b) Ï†â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by (clarsimp simp add: Ï†Prod_expn'' Ï†Prod_expn')



subsection â€¹Normalization of Assertionsâ€º

subsubsection â€¹Declaring Simpsetsâ€º

consts assertion_simps :: â€¹mode â‡’ modeâ€º
       SOURCE :: mode
       TARGET :: mode

ML â€¹
structure Assertion_SS = Simpset (
  val initial_ss = Simpset_Configure.Minimal_SS
  val binding = SOME \<^binding>â€¹assertion_simpsâ€º
  val comment = "Simplification rules normalizing an assertion. \
                       \It is applied before NToA process."
  val attribute = NONE
  val post_merging = I
)

val _ = Theory.setup (Context.theory_map (Assertion_SS.map (fn ctxt =>
      (ctxt addsimprocs [\<^simproc>â€¹NO_MATCHâ€º, \<^simproc>â€¹defined_Exâ€º, \<^simproc>â€¹HOL.defined_Allâ€º,
                         \<^simproc>â€¹defined_allâ€º, \<^simproc>â€¹defined_Collectâ€º, \<^simproc>â€¹Set.defined_Allâ€º,
                         \<^simproc>â€¹Set.defined_Bexâ€º, \<^simproc>â€¹unit_eqâ€º, \<^simproc>â€¹case_prod_betaâ€º,
                         \<^simproc>â€¹case_prod_etaâ€º, \<^simproc>â€¹Collect_memâ€º,
                         Phi_Conv.move_Ex_for_set_notation]
            addsimps @{thms' Sum_Type.sum.case HOL.simp_thms})
          (*|> Simplifier.add_cong @{thm' Subjection_cong}*)
    )))

structure Assertion_SS_Source = Simpset (
  val initial_ss = Simpset_Configure.Empty_SS
  val binding = SOME \<^binding>â€¹assertion_simps_sourceâ€º
  val comment = "Simp rules normalizing particularly source part of an assertion."
  val attribute = NONE
  val post_merging = I
)

val _ = Theory.setup (Context.theory_map (Assertion_SS_Source.map (fn ctxt =>
      ctxt addsimps @{thms' ExBI_defined}
        |> Simplifier.add_cong @{thm' Subjection_cong}
    )))

structure Assertion_SS_Target = Simpset (
  val initial_ss = Simpset_Configure.Empty_SS
  val binding = SOME \<^binding>â€¹assertion_simps_targetâ€º
  val comment = "Simp rules normalizing particularly target part of an assertion."
  val attribute = NONE
  val post_merging = I
)
â€º

lemmas [assertion_simps] =
  (*algebras*)
  mult_zero_right[where 'a=â€¹'a::sep_magma BIâ€º] mult_zero_left[where 'a=â€¹'a::sep_magma BIâ€º]
  mult_1_right[where 'a=â€¹'a::sep_magma_1 BIâ€º]
  mult_1_left[where 'a=â€¹'a::sep_magma_1 BIâ€º]
  add_0_right[where 'a=â€¹'a::sep_magma BIâ€º] add_0_left[where 'a=â€¹'a::sep_magma BIâ€º]
  zero_fun zero_fun_def[symmetric, where 'b=â€¹'a::sep_magma BIâ€º]
  plus_fun[where 'a=â€¹'a::sep_magma BIâ€º]
  distrib_right[where 'a=â€¹'a::sep_semigroup BIâ€º]
  mult.assoc[where 'a=â€¹'a::sep_semigroup BIâ€º]
  bot_eq_BI_bot

  (*BI connectives*)
  Subjection_Subjection Subjection_Zero Subjection_True Subjection_Flase
  Subjection_times Subjection_addconj

  ExBI_simps ExBI_split_prod ExBI_subj_split_prod

  sep_quant_subjection sep_quant_ExBI

  Ï†Prod_expn'' Ï†Prod_expn'
  HOL.if_True HOL.if_False

  Ï†Bot.unfold Ï†Any.unfold Ï†None_itself_is_one

  (*Usual simps*)
  fst_conv snd_conv

lemmas [assertion_simps_source] =
  ExBI_times_left ExBI_times_right ExBI_adconj ExBI_addisj

  REMAINS_def

  sep_quant_sep

lemmas [assertion_simps_target] =
  sep_quant_sep[symmetric]

lemmas [Ï†programming_base_simps, Ï†programming_simps, Ï†safe_simp] =
  add_0_right[where 'a=â€¹'a::sep_magma BIâ€º] add_0_left[where 'a=â€¹'a::sep_magma BIâ€º]
  zero_fun_def[symmetric, where 'b=â€¹'a::sep_magma BIâ€º]
  plus_fun[where 'a=â€¹'a::sep_magma BIâ€º]
  distrib_right[where 'a=â€¹'a::sep_semigroup BIâ€º]
  mult.assoc[where 'a=â€¹'a::sep_semigroup BIâ€º]
  REMAINS_def

lemmas [Ï†programming_base_simps] =
  mult_zero_right[where 'a=â€¹'a::sep_magma BIâ€º] mult_zero_left[where 'a=â€¹'a::sep_magma BIâ€º]
  mult_1_right[where 'a=â€¹'a::sep_magma_1 BIâ€º] mult_1_left[where 'a=â€¹'a::sep_magma_1 BIâ€º]
  zero_fun

  HOL.simp_thms

  HOL.if_True HOL.if_False


ML_file â€¹library/reasoning/quantifier.MLâ€º

simproc_setup defined_ExBI ( â€¹ExBI Aâ€º ) = â€¹K BI_Quantifiers.defined_Exâ€º

setup â€¹Context.theory_map (Phi_Programming_Simp_Hook.add 100 (fn () => fn ctxt =>
    ctxt delsimprocs [@{simproc defined_ExBI}]
         delsimps @{thms' ExBI_defined}))
â€º

setup â€¹Context.theory_map (
  Assertion_SS_Source.map (fn ctxt =>
    ctxt addsimprocs [@{simproc defined_ExBI}] ) #>
  Assertion_SS.map (fn ctxt =>
    ctxt addsimprocs [@{simproc Funcomp_Lambda}]) #>
  Phi_Safe_Simps.map (fn ctxt =>
    ctxt addsimprocs [@{simproc defined_ExBI}, @{simproc Funcomp_Lambda}]))â€º


subsubsection â€¹Reasonersâ€º

Ï†reasoner_ML assertion_simp_source 1300
  (â€¹Simplify (assertion_simps SOURCE) ?X' ?Xâ€º)
  = â€¹Phi_Reasoners.wrap (PLPR_Simplifier.simplifier_by_ss' (K Seq.empty) (fn ctxt =>
      Raw_Simplifier.merge_ss (Assertion_SS.get' ctxt, Assertion_SS_Source.get' ctxt)) {fix_vars=false}) o sndâ€º

Ï†reasoner_ML assertion_simp_target 1300
  (â€¹Simplify (assertion_simps TARGET) ?X' ?Xâ€º)
  = â€¹Phi_Reasoners.wrap (PLPR_Simplifier.simplifier_by_ss' (K Seq.empty) (fn ctxt =>
      Raw_Simplifier.merge_ss (Assertion_SS.get' ctxt, Assertion_SS_Target.get' ctxt)) {fix_vars=false}) o sndâ€º

Ï†reasoner_ML assertion_simp 1200
  (â€¹Premise (assertion_simps _) _â€º | â€¹Simplify (assertion_simps ?ANY) ?X' ?Xâ€º )
  = â€¹Phi_Reasoners.wrap (PLPR_Simplifier.simplifier_by_ss' (K Seq.empty) Assertion_SS.get' {fix_vars=false}) o sndâ€º

ML â€¹
fun conv_transformation_by_assertion_ss ctxt =
  let val src_ctxt = Assertion_SS_Source.enhance (Assertion_SS.equip ctxt)
      val target_ctxt = Assertion_SS_Target.enhance (Assertion_SS.equip ctxt)
   in Phi_Syntax.transformation_conv (Simplifier.rewrite src_ctxt)
                                     (Simplifier.rewrite target_ctxt)
                                     Conv.all_conv
  end

fun skolemize_transformation ctxt th =
  let fun skolem th =
       (case Phi_Syntax.dest_transformation (Thm.major_prem_of th)
          of (Const(\<^const_name>â€¹ExBIâ€º, _) $ _,
              Const(\<^const_name>â€¹Ï†TagAâ€º, _) $ _ $ (Const(\<^const_name>â€¹REMAINSâ€º, _) $ _ $ _), _) =>
              skolem (@{thm' skolemize_transformation_tR} RS th)
           | (Const(\<^const_name>â€¹ExBIâ€º, _) $ _,
              Const(\<^const_name>â€¹REMAINSâ€º, _) $ _ $ _ , _) =>
              skolem (@{thm' skolemize_transformation_R} RS th)
           | (Const(\<^const_name>â€¹ExBIâ€º, _) $ _, _, _) =>
              skolem (@{thm' skolemize_transformation} RS th)
           | _ => th)
   in th
   |> Conv.gconv_rule (Phi_Conv.hhf_concl_conv (fn ctxt =>
            conv_transformation_by_assertion_ss ctxt
          ) ctxt) 1
   |> skolem
  end
â€º


subsection â€¹Transformation-based Simplificationâ€º

type_synonym forward_direction = bool (*false for backward*)

consts ğ’œsimp' :: â€¹ forward_direction â‡’ action â€º
       ğ’œ_transitive_simp' :: â€¹ forward_direction â‡’ actionâ€º
                  (*rules where simplifications will be applied
                    repeatedly on the simplified results given by the previous step.
                    The annotation exists only in the literal source syntacitcally but once
                    it is added to Ï†-LPR, will be reduced by a rule pass
                    converting â€¹X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y @tag ğ’œ_transitive_simpâ€º to
                    â€¹Y ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Z @tag ğ’œsimp âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Z @tag ğ’œsimpâ€º*)
      ğ’œtry_simp' :: â€¹ action â‡’ bool â€• â€¹output: made any substantial changeâ€º â‡’ action â€º

abbreviation â€¹ğ’œsimp â‰¡ ğ’œsimp' Trueâ€º
abbreviation â€¹ğ’œtry_simp â‰¡ ğ’œtry_simp' ğ’œsimpâ€º
abbreviation â€¹ğ’œ_transitive_simp â‰¡ ğ’œ_transitive_simp' Trueâ€º

abbreviation â€¹ğ’œbackward_simp â‰¡ ğ’œsimp' Falseâ€º
abbreviation â€¹ğ’œtry_backward_simp â‰¡ ğ’œtry_simp' ğ’œbackward_simpâ€º
abbreviation â€¹ğ’œ_backward_transitive_simp â‰¡ ğ’œ_transitive_simp' Falseâ€º

text â€¹Potentially weakening transformations designed for simplifying state sequents of the CoP.

  \<^prop>â€¹x â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ U ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y. r y @tag ğ’œsimpâ€º

  Doing this simplification in the framework of To-Transformation benefits it by reusing the
  To-Transformation support in transformation functors, which brings the simplification into the elements.

  The simplification is very heavy.
  For the sake of performance, it is indolent and is applied only when the state sequent
  needs the simplification. There is a mechanism to detect such need. The default strategy is,
  we collect all the registered simplification rules, get the pattern of the source type of the
  transformations, and if the types of a state sequent match any of a pattern, the simplification
  is required and activated.

  This default strategy is not perfect, so we provide hooks by which users can provide ML checkers.
  The checker can bind on either the whole types or subterms of specific constant heads.
  The checker only checks the type part.

  Note \<^prop>â€¹A @tag ğ’œsimpâ€º requires the process to at least make one meaningful reduction
  step that at least simplifies something. Backtracking happens if fails to simplify anything.
  Use \<^term>â€¹ğ’œtry_simp CHANGEDâ€º to try to simplify something or keep it unchanged on failure.
â€º

subsubsection â€¹Conventionâ€º

Ï†reasoner_group Ï†simp_all = (100, [1,4000]) for ( â€¹X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’œsimp' directionâ€º )
      â€¹Simplifying the assertion by means of transformation, which may weaken the assertion and
       refine the abstraction (or backwardly strengthen by â€¹ğ’œbackward_simpâ€º)â€º
 and Ï†simp = (100, [80, 120]) in Ï†simp_all
      â€¹User rules of transformation-based simplificationâ€º
 and Ï†simp_fallback = (10, [5,20]) in Ï†simp_all
      â€¹Fallbacks of transformation-based simplificationâ€º
 and Ï†simp_derived = (50, [30,70]) in Ï†simp_all and > Ï†simp_fallback and < Ï†simp
      â€¹Automatically derived transformation-based simplificationâ€º
 and Ï†simp_cut = (1000, [1000, 1030]) in Ï†simp_all
      â€¹Cutting rules of transformation-based simplificationâ€º

declare [[ Ï†reason_default_pattern
      â€¹?X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (y â¦‚ _ ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y. _) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— ?P @tag ğ’œsimp' Trueâ€º â‡’
      â€¹?X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’œsimp' Trueâ€º (100)
  and â€¹?X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (y â¦‚ _ ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y. _) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— ?P @tag ğ’œ_transitive_simp' Trueâ€º â‡’
      â€¹?X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’œ_transitive_simp' Trueâ€º (100)

  and â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (y â¦‚ ?T y ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y. _) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— ?P @tag ğ’œsimp' Falseâ€º â‡’
      â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (y â¦‚ ?T y ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y. _) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’œsimp' Falseâ€º (100)
  and â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (y â¦‚ ?T y ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y. _) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— ?P @tag ğ’œ_transitive_simp' Falseâ€º â‡’
      â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (y â¦‚ ?T y ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y. _) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’œ_transitive_simp' Falseâ€º (100)

  and â€¹?X @tag ğ’œsimp' ?directionâ€º â‡’
      â€¹ERROR TEXT(â€¹Bad form: â€º (?X @tag ğ’œsimp' ?direction) â
                  â€¹Expect: â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (y â¦‚ ?Y ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y. ?r y) @tag ğ’œsimpâ€ºâ€º)â€º (0)
  and â€¹?X @tag ğ’œ_transitive_simp' ?directionâ€º â‡’
      â€¹ERROR TEXT(â€¹Bad form: â€º (?X @tag ğ’œ_transitive_simp' ?direction) â
                  â€¹Expect: â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (y â¦‚ ?Y ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y. ?r y) @tag ğ’œsimpâ€ºâ€º)â€º (0)
  and â€¹?X @tag ğ’œtry_simp' ?direction ?changedâ€º â‡’
      â€¹ERROR TEXT(â€¹Bad rule, ğ’œtry_simp' is preserved for internal use only.â€º â
                  (?X @tag ğ’œtry_simp' ?direction ?changed))â€º (0)
]]

lemma [Ï†reason %Ï†simp_cut+1 for â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (y â¦‚ _ ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y. _) @tag ğ’œtry_simp' _ _â€º]:
  â€¹ ğ—€ğ—ğ–ºğ—‹ğ–½ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (y â¦‚ U ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y. R y) @tag A
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (y â¦‚ U ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y. R y) @tag ğ’œtry_simp' A True â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def ğ—‹Guard_def .

lemma [Ï†reason %Ï†simp_cut for â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (y â¦‚ _ ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y. _) @tag ğ’œtry_simp' _ _â€º]:
  â€¹ x â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (y â¦‚ T ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y. y = x) @tag ğ’œtry_simp' A False â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def ğ—‹Guard_def
  by simp


subsubsection â€¹Implementationâ€º

consts ğ’œsimp_if_need :: â€¹forward_direction â‡’ actionâ€º
       ğ’œexhausitive_simp :: â€¹ forward_direction
                            â‡’ bool â€• â€¹input: set this to False to disable the simpâ€º
                            â‡’ actionâ€º
       ğ’œ_apply_simplication :: â€¹actionâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %cutting for â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’œ_apply_simplicationâ€º]:
  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y' ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Any @tag ğ’œ_map_each_item (ğ’œexhausitive_simp True True)
âŸ¹ ğ—Œğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¿ğ—’[assertion_simps SOURCE] Y : Y'
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y @tag ğ’œ_apply_simplication â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def Transformation_def Simplify_def
  by simp

lemma ğ’œsimp_invoke:
  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Any @tag ğ’œ_map_each_item (ğ’œexhausitive_simp True True)
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by (simp add: transformation_weaken)

ML_file â€¹library/tools/CoP_simp.MLâ€º

context begin

private lemma ğ’œsimp_chk_no_need:
  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X @tag ğ’œsimp_if_need directionâ€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by simp

private lemma ğ’œsimp_chk_no_need':
  â€¹ x â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ T ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y. y = x @tag ğ’œsimp_if_need directionâ€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by (simp add: ExBI_defined)

private lemma ğ’œsimp_chk_go:
  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y @tag ğ’œtry_simp' (ğ’œsimp' direction) ANY
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y @tag ğ’œsimp_if_need directionâ€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def .

private lemma ğ’œsimp_chk_go_transitive:
  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ U ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y. r y @tag ğ’œtry_simp' (ğ’œsimp' True) CHANGED
âŸ¹ âˆ€y. ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ r y âŸ¶ (y â¦‚ U ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ z â¦‚ Z ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ z. w y z @tag ğ’œexhausitive_simp True CHANGED)
âŸ¹ ğ—Œğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¿ğ—’[ğ—Œğ–ºğ–¿ğ–¾] r' : (Î»z. âˆƒy. r y âˆ§ w y z)
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ z â¦‚ Z ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ z. r' z @tag ğ’œexhausitive_simp True ANYâ€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def Transformation_def Premise_def Simplify_def
  by clarsimp blast

private lemma ğ’œsimp_chk_go_transitive_backward:
  â€¹ (â‹€y. ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ w y âŸ¹ y â¦‚ U ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ z â¦‚ Z ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ z. r y z @tag ğ’œtry_simp' (ğ’œsimp' False) CHANGED)
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ U ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y. w y @tag ğ’œexhausitive_simp False CHANGED
âŸ¹ ğ—Œğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¿ğ—’[ğ—Œğ–ºğ–¿ğ–¾] r' : (Î»z. âˆƒy. w y âˆ§ r y z)
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ z â¦‚ Z ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ z. r' z @tag ğ’œexhausitive_simp False ANYâ€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def Transformation_def Premise_def Simplify_def
  by clarsimp blast

private lemma ğ’œsimp_chk_no_need_transitive:
  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X @tag ğ’œexhausitive_simp direction ANYâ€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by simp

private lemma ğ’œsimp_chk_no_need'_transitive:
  â€¹ x â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ T ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y. y = x @tag ğ’œexhausitive_simp direction ANYâ€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by (simp add: ExBI_defined)

Ï†reasoner_ML ğ’œsimp_if_need %cutting (â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’œsimp_if_need _â€º) = â€¹
fn (_, (ctxt,sequent)) => Seq.make (fn () =>
  let val (bvs, goal) = Phi_Help.strip_meta_hhf_bvs (Phi_Help.leading_antecedent' sequent)
      val (ToA, Const _ $ direction_term) = PLPR_Syntax.dest_action_of' (K true) goal
      val (X, Y', _) = Phi_Syntax.dest_transformation ToA
      val direction = case direction_term of Const(\<^const_name>â€¹Trueâ€º, _) => true
                                           | Const(\<^const_name>â€¹Falseâ€º, _) => false
                                           | _ => raise TERM ("The direction of ğ’œsimp_if_need must be a literal", [direction_term])
      val (Y, ex_bound) =
            case Y' of Const(\<^const_name>â€¹ExBIâ€º, _) $ Abs (N, Ty,
                          Const(\<^const_name>â€¹Subjectionâ€º, _) $ (Y as Const(\<^const_name>â€¹Ï†Typeâ€º, _) $ Bound 0 $ _) $ _)
                         => (Y, SOME (N,Ty))
                     | _ => (Y', NONE)
   in if (if direction then Phi_CoP_Simp.is_simp_needed (Context.Proof ctxt) bvs X
                       else Phi_CoP_Backward_Simp.is_simp_needed (Context.Proof ctxt) (the_list ex_bound @ bvs) Y)
   then SOME ((ctxt, @{thm' ğ’œsimp_chk_go} RS' (ctxt, sequent)), Seq.empty)
   else let val rule = if is_some ex_bound then @{thm' ğ’œsimp_chk_no_need'}
                                           else @{thm' ğ’œsimp_chk_no_need}
    in SOME ((ctxt, rule RS' (ctxt, sequent)), Seq.empty)
   end
  end)
â€º

Ï†reasoner_ML ğ’œexhausitive_simp %cutting (â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’œexhausitive_simp _ _â€º) = â€¹
let val norm_tail = @{lemma' â€¹
        x â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ z â¦‚ Z ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ z. r z @tag A
    âŸ¹ ğ—Œğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¿ğ—’[assertion_simps SOURCE] Z' : z â¦‚ Z ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ z. r z
    âŸ¹ x â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Z' @tag Aâ€º
        by (simp add: Action_Tag_def Simplify_def)}

 in fn (_, (ctxt,sequent)) => Seq.make (fn () =>
  let val (bvs, goal) = Phi_Help.strip_meta_hhf_bvs (Phi_Help.leading_antecedent' sequent)
      val (ToA, Const _ (*ğ’œexhausitive_simp*)
                  $ direction_term
                  $ IS_NEEDED
          ) = PLPR_Syntax.dest_action_of' (K true) goal
      val (X, Y', _) = Phi_Syntax.dest_transformation ToA
      val direction = case direction_term of Const(\<^const_name>â€¹Trueâ€º, _) => true
                                           | Const(\<^const_name>â€¹Falseâ€º, _) => false
                                           | _ => raise TERM ("The direction of ğ’œsimp_if_need must be a literal", [direction_term])
      val (Y, ex_bound) =
            case Y' of Const(\<^const_name>â€¹ExBIâ€º, _) $ Abs (N, Ty,
                          Const(\<^const_name>â€¹Subjectionâ€º, _) $ (Y as Const(\<^const_name>â€¹Ï†Typeâ€º, _) $ Bound 0 $ _) $ _)
                         => (Y, SOME (N, Ty))
                     | _ => (Y', NONE)
      val is_needed =
          IS_NEEDED <> \<^Const>â€¹Falseâ€º andalso
         (if direction then Phi_CoP_Simp.is_simp_needed (Context.Proof ctxt) bvs X
                       else Phi_CoP_Backward_Simp.is_simp_needed (Context.Proof ctxt) (the_list ex_bound @ bvs) Y)
   in if is_needed
   then let val sequent' = if is_some ex_bound
                           then sequent
                           else norm_tail RS sequent
     in SOME ((ctxt, (if direction then @{thm' ğ’œsimp_chk_go_transitive}
                                   else @{thm' ğ’œsimp_chk_go_transitive_backward})
                      RS' (ctxt, sequent)), Seq.empty)
    end
   else let val rule = if is_some ex_bound then @{thm' ğ’œsimp_chk_no_need'_transitive}
                                           else @{thm' ğ’œsimp_chk_no_need_transitive}
    in SOME ((ctxt, rule RS' (ctxt, sequent)), Seq.empty)
   end
  end)
end
â€º

end

paragraph â€¹Invoking CoP-simp in ToA reasoningâ€º

ML â€¹

val normalize_source = @{lemma
  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X' @tag ğ’œ_map_each_item (ğ’œexhausitive_simp True True)
âŸ¹ X' ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P â€º
  by (clarsimp simp: Action_Tag_def Transformation_def, blast)
}

fun normalize_source_of_ToA (ctxt, sequent) =
  let val (bvs, ToA) = Phi_Help.strip_meta_hhf_bvs (Phi_Help.leading_antecedent' sequent)
      val (X, _, _) = Phi_Syntax.dest_transformation ToA
   in if Phi_Syntax.exists_item_of_assertion (Phi_CoP_Simp.is_simp_needed (Context.Proof ctxt)) bvs X
      then (
        Phi_Reasoner.info_print ctxt 2 (K "normalizing the source assertion of the transformation") ;
        case Phi_Reasoner.internal_reason NONE (SOME 1) (ctxt, normalize_source RS sequent)
          of NONE => (ctxt, sequent)
           | SOME (ctxt', sequent') => 
                (ctxt', Conv.gconv_rule (Phi_Conv.hhf_concl_conv (conv_transformation_by_assertion_ss) ctxt') 1 sequent'))
      else (ctxt, sequent)
  end

fun normalize_target_of_ToA parse (ctxt, sequent) =
  let val (bvs, ToA) = Phi_Help.strip_meta_hhf_bvs (Phi_Help.leading_antecedent' sequent)
      val (Y, rule) = parse (Phi_Syntax.dest_transformation ToA)
                      (* of (_, Const(\<^const_name>â€¹REMAINSâ€º, _) $ Y $ _, _) => (Y, true)
                          | (_, Y, _) => (Y, false) *)
   in if Phi_CoP_Backward_Simp.is_simp_needed (Context.Proof ctxt) bvs Y
      then (
        Phi_Reasoner.info_print ctxt 2 (K "normalizing the target assertion of the transformation") ;
        case Phi_Reasoner.internal_reason NONE (SOME 1) (ctxt, rule RS sequent)
          of NONE => (ctxt, sequent)
           | SOME ret => ret)
      else (ctxt, sequent)
  end

fun chk_target_of_ToA_requires_normalization parse_term (ctxt, sequent) =
  let val (bvs, ToA) = Phi_Help.strip_meta_hhf_bvs (Phi_Help.leading_antecedent' sequent)
      val target = parse_term (#2 (Phi_Syntax.dest_transformation ToA))
   in Phi_CoP_Backward_Simp.is_simp_needed (Context.Proof ctxt) bvs target orelse
      (case target
         of Const(\<^const_name>â€¹Ï†Typeâ€º, _) $ x $ T =>
              let val head = Term.head_of x
               in not (is_Var head) orelse exists_subterm (fn y => y aconv head) T
              end
          | _ => false)
  end
â€º



subsubsection â€¹Simplification Protectâ€º

definition [simplification_protect]:
  â€¹Ï†TBS_Simp_Protect X U r direction â‰¡ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ U ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y. r y @tag ğ’œsimp' directionâ€º

lemma [cong]:
  â€¹ X â‰¡ X'
âŸ¹ U â‰¡ U'
âŸ¹ r â‰¡ r'
âŸ¹ Ï†TBS_Simp_Protect X U r direction â‰¡ Ï†TBS_Simp_Protect X' U' r' direction â€º
  by simp

subsubsection â€¹Extracting Pureâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %extract_pure]:
  â€¹ ğ—‹ESC P A
âŸ¹ ğ—‹ESC P (A @tag ğ’œsimp' direction) â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by blast

lemma [Ï†reason %extract_pure]:
  â€¹ ğ—‹EIF A P
âŸ¹ ğ—‹EIF (A @tag ğ’œsimp' direction) P â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by blast


subsection â€¹Falling Lattice of Transformation Sub-proceduresâ€º

subsubsection â€¹From â€¹ğ’¯ğ’«'â€º to â€¹ğ’¯ğ’«â€ºâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason default %ToA_falling_latice+3]:
  â€¹ ğ—€ğ—ğ–ºğ—‹ğ–½ fst x â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«
âŸ¹ May_Assign (snd x) unspec
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ T âœ¼ â—‹ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (y, unspec) â¦‚ U âœ¼ â—‹ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«' â€º
  unfolding ğ—‹Guard_def Action_Tag_def Ï†Prod'_def Transformation_def
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason default %ToA_falling_latice+2]:
  â€¹ x â¦‚ X âœ¼ Y ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ prod.swap x â¦‚ Y âœ¼ X @tag ğ’¯ğ’«' â€º
  for X :: â€¹('a::sep_algebra,'b) Ï†â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def Ï†Prod'_def Ï†Prod_def Ï†Type_def Transformation_def
  by (cases x; simp add: mult.commute)

lemma [Ï†reason default %ToA_falling_latice+1]:
  â€¹ ğ—€ğ—ğ–ºğ—‹ğ–½ Push_Envir_Var prove_obligations_in_time True âˆ§â‡©ğ—‹
         Identity_Elementâ‡©I (fst x â¦‚ T) P âˆ§â‡©ğ—‹
         Pop_Envir_Var prove_obligations_in_time
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ T âœ¼ U ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (snd x, unspec) â¦‚ U âœ¼ â—‹ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'â€º
  for T :: â€¹('c::sep_magma_1, 'x) Ï†â€º
  â€• â€¹the transformation from T to U fails, and the algebra is non-commutative, nor any methods of a higher priority,
      so â€¹Tâ€º or â€¹Uâ€º can only be identity if the reasoning can continueâ€º
  unfolding ğ—‹Guard_def Ant_Seq_def Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def Transformation_def Action_Tag_def Ï†Prod'_def
  by (clarsimp; fastforce)

lemma [Ï†reason default %ToA_falling_latice]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (one â¦‚ U)
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ T âœ¼ â—‹ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (one, fst x) â¦‚ U âœ¼ T @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'â€º
  for T :: â€¹('c::sep_magma_1, 'x) Ï†â€º
  unfolding ğ—‹Guard_def Ant_Seq_def Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def Transformation_def Premise_def Action_Tag_def Ï†Prod'_def
  by (clarsimp; force)


subsubsection â€¹From â€¹ğ’¯ğ’«â€º to â€¹ğ’¯ğ’«'â€ºâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason default %ToA_falling_latice+3]:
  â€¹ (x, w) â¦‚ T âœ¼ W ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ yr â¦‚ U âœ¼ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (w â¦‚ W)
âŸ¹ snd yr â¦‚ R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ RR @clean
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ fst yr â¦‚ U ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ RR ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’« â€º
  unfolding Premise_def Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def Try_def Action_Tag_def Ï†Prod'_def REMAINS_def
  by (clarsimp simp add: Ï†Some_transformation_strip Ï†Prod_expn'' Ï†Prod_expn',
      smt (z3) BI_eq_ToA mult_1_class.mult_1_right transformation_left_frame transformation_trans)

lemma [Ï†reason default %ToA_falling_latice+3]:
  â€¹ (x,w) â¦‚ T âœ¼ W ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ U âœ¼ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P1 @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'
âŸ¹ ğ—Œğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¿ğ—’[ğ—Œğ–ºğ–¿ğ–¾] y' : y
âŸ¹ ğ—Œğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¿ğ—’[ğ—Œğ–ºğ–¿ğ–¾] yâ‡©1 : fst y'
âŸ¹ ğ—Œğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¿ğ—’[ğ—Œğ–ºğ–¿ğ–¾] r  : snd y'
âŸ¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ w â¦‚ W ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ RR ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P2 @tag ğ’¯ğ’«
âŸ¹ (r â¦‚ R) * RR ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ RRR @clean
âŸ¹ (x â¦‚ T) * A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ yâ‡©1 â¦‚ U ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ RRR ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P2 âˆ§ P1 @tag ğ’¯ğ’« â€º
  for A :: â€¹'a::sep_monoid BIâ€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def Simplify_def Action_Tag_def Ï†Prod'_def REMAINS_def
  apply (clarsimp simp: Ï†Some_Ï†Prod Ï†Some_transformation_strip Ï†Prod_expn' Ï†Prod_expn'' mult.assoc[symmetric])
  subgoal premises prems
  by (insert prems(1)[THEN transformation_right_frame, where R=â€¹RRâ€º]
            prems(5)[THEN transformation_left_frame, where R=â€¹x â¦‚ Tâ€º]
            prems(6)[THEN transformation_left_frame, where R=â€¹fst y â¦‚ Uâ€º],
      smt (z3) mult.assoc transformation_trans) .

lemma [Ï†reason default %ToA_falling_latice+3]:
  â€¹ (x, w) â¦‚ T âœ¼ W ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ U âœ¼ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P1 @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'
âŸ¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I (snd y â¦‚ R) Q
âŸ¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ w â¦‚ W ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P2 @tag ğ’¯ğ’«
âŸ¹ (x â¦‚ T) * A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ fst y â¦‚ U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P2 âˆ§ Q âˆ§ P1 @tag ğ’¯ğ’« â€º
  for A :: â€¹'a :: sep_magma_1 BIâ€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def Ï†Prod_expn' Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def Premise_def
            Transformation_def Try_def Ant_Seq_def Ï†Prod'_def
  by (clarsimp; fastforce)

lemma (*ToA_splitting_source_no_remainder_first*)
      [no_atp, Ï†reason %ToA_falling_latice+2 except â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (_ :: ?'a :: sep_semigroup BI) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º]:
  " R = 1 âˆ§â‡©ğ—‹ (A * B ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«) âˆ¨â‡©câ‡©uâ‡©t
    P = (P1 âˆ§ P2) âˆ§â‡©ğ—‹ (A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P1 @tag ğ’¯ğ’«) âˆ§â‡©ğ—‹
    (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ P1 âŸ¶ (B ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P2 @tag ğ’¯ğ’«))
âŸ¹ A * B ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«"
  unfolding Orelse_shortcut_def Transformation_def REMAINS_def Premise_def Ant_Seq_def Action_Tag_def
  by clarsimp (metis One_expn mult_1_class.mult_1_right sep_magma_1_left)

lemma [Ï†reason default %ToA_falling_latice+2]: â€• â€¹when X fails to match â€¹x â¦‚ Tâ€ºâ€º
  â€¹ R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R' ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«
âŸ¹ X * R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ X * R' ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’« â€º
  for Y :: â€¹'c::sep_algebra BIâ€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def REMAINS_def
  by (simp add: mult.left_commute transformation_left_frame)

lemma [Ï†reason default %ToA_falling_latice+1]: â€• â€¹when X fails to match â€¹x â¦‚ Tâ€º, nor a abelian semigroupâ€º
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©E (var_y â¦‚ U)
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ var_y â¦‚ U ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ X @tag ğ’¯ğ’« â€º
  for X :: â€¹'c::sep_magma_1 BIâ€º
  unfolding Transformation_def Identity_Elementâ‡©E_def Action_Tag_def
  by (clarsimp, force)

subsubsection â€¹For Non-Unital Algerasâ€º

lemma closed_homo_sep_Some:
  â€¹ closed_homo_sep Some â€º
  unfolding closed_homo_sep_def closed_homo_sep_disj_def homo_sep_def homo_sep_mult_def homo_sep_disj_def
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason default %ToA_falling_latice
               for â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ * _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º
                   â€¹_ * _ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º
               except â€¹(_ :: ?'a::sep_magma_1 BI) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º ]:
  â€¹ ğ—Œğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¿ğ—’[assertion_simps SOURCE] X' : Î¨[Some] X
âŸ¹ ğ—Œğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¿ğ—’[assertion_simps TARGET] Y' : Î¨[Some] Y
âŸ¹ X' ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y' ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’« â€º
  unfolding Transformation_def Action_Tag_def Simplify_def
  by auto

lemma [assertion_simps]:
  â€¹ Î¨[Some] (x â¦‚ T) = (x â¦‚ â— T) â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
  by (auto simp: split_option_all)

lemma [assertion_simps]:
  â€¹Î¨[Some] (X * Y) = Î¨[Some] X * Î¨[Some] Yâ€º
  for X :: â€¹'c::sep_magma BIâ€º
  by (simp add: Î¨_Multiplicative_Conj[OF closed_homo_sep_Some])

lemma [assertion_simps]:
  â€¹ Î¨[Some] (A ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P) = (Î¨[Some] A ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ P) â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
  by simp blast

lemma [assertion_simps]:
  â€¹ Î¨[Some] (âˆƒ*x. A x) = (âˆƒ*x. Î¨[Some] (A x)) â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
  by simp blast

lemma [assertion_simps]:
  â€¹ Î¨[Some] (A + B) = Î¨[Some] A + Î¨[Some] B â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
  by simp blast

lemma [assertion_simps]:
  â€¹ Î¨[Some] (A âŠ“ B) = Î¨[Some] A âŠ“ Î¨[Some] B â€º
  unfolding BI_eq_iff
  by simp blast



subsection â€¹Essential Reasoning Proceduresâ€º

subsubsection â€¹Reflexive Transformationâ€º

paragraph â€¹When the target and the source are either alpha-equivalent or unifiedâ€º

text â€¹Applying reflexive transformation on alpha-equivalent couples of source and target is safe,
so be applied of high priority.
In contrast, unification by reflexive transformation is aggressive. Therefore, they are applied
only when no other rules are applicable.â€º

declare transformation_refl [Ï†reason %ToA_refl for â€¹?A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ?A ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º
                                                   â€¹_ â¦‚ ?T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ?var_y â¦‚ ?T ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º,
                             Ï†reason %ToA_unified_refl for â€¹_ â¦‚ ?T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ?var_y â¦‚ ?U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º]

lemma [Ï†reason default %ToA_unified_refl for â€¹?A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ?A' ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º]:
  â€¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A â€º
  unfolding Premise_def ğ—‹Guard_def Action_Tag_def
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_refl for â€¹?A * _ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (?A :: ?'c::sep_magma_1 BI) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º,
       Ï†reason default %ToA_unified_refl for â€¹?A * _ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (?A' :: ?'c::sep_magma_1 BI) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º]:
  â€¹ Identity_Elementâ‡©I R P
âŸ¹ A * R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P â€º
  for A :: â€¹'c::sep_magma_1 BIâ€º
  unfolding Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def Transformation_def Action_Tag_def
  by clarsimp fastforce

lemma transformation_refl_assigning_remainder [
          Ï†reason %ToA_assigning_var for â€¹?A * _ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ?A ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’« â€º
                                         â€¹(_ â¦‚ ?T) * _ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ?var_y â¦‚ ?T ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’« â€º,
          Ï†reason default %ToA_unified_refl for â€¹_ * _ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º ]:
  â€¹A * R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ Râ€º
  unfolding REMAINS_def Action_Tag_def
  by simp

lemma transformation_refl_with_remainder [
        Ï†reason %ToA_assigning_var for â€¹?A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ?A ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º
                                       â€¹_ â¦‚ ?T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ?var_y â¦‚ ?T ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º,
        Ï†reason default %ToA_unified_refl for â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º ]:
  â€¹A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ 1â€º
  for A :: â€¹'a::sep_magma_1 BIâ€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def REMAINS_def
  by simp

lemma transformation_refl_assigning_W [
        Ï†reason %ToA_assigning_var,
        Ï†reason default %ToA_unified_refl for â€¹_ â¦‚ _ âœ¼ _ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ â¦‚ (_ âˆ— _) âœ¼ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'â€º ]:
  â€¹ x â¦‚ T âœ¼ U ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (x, unspec) â¦‚ (T âˆ— U) âœ¼ â—‹ â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def Ï†Prod'_def Ï†Prod_expn'
  by simp

lemma transformation_refl_assigning_R [
        Ï†reason %ToA_assigning_var,
        Ï†reason default %ToA_unified_refl for â€¹_ â¦‚ (_ âˆ— _) âœ¼ _ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ â¦‚ _ âœ¼ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'â€º ]:
  â€¹ May_Assign (snd x) unspec
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ (T âˆ— U) âœ¼ â—‹ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ fst x â¦‚ T âœ¼ U â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def Ï†Prod'_def
  by (cases x; simp add: Ï†Prod_expn')

lemma transformation_refl_with_WR [
        Ï†reason %ToA_assigning_var+1,
        Ï†reason default %ToA_unified_refl+1 for â€¹_ â¦‚ _ âœ¼ _ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ â¦‚ _ âœ¼ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'â€º ]:
        â€• â€¹Higher than â€¹transformation_reflâ€º to set the condition variable Crâ€º
  â€¹ May_Assign (snd x) unspec
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ T âœ¼ â—‹ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ x â¦‚ T âœ¼ â—‹ â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by simp

lemma ToA_refls_by_T_eq:
  â€¹ T = T'
âŸ¹ May_Assign (snd xâ‡©2) unspec
âŸ¹ xâ‡©2 â¦‚ T âœ¼ â—‹ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ xâ‡©2 â¦‚ T' âœ¼ â—‹ â€º
  â€¹ T = T'
âŸ¹ (x â¦‚ T) * R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ x â¦‚ T' ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R â€º
  â€¹ T = T'
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ x â¦‚ T' â€º
  unfolding Ï†Prod'_def REMAINS_def
  by simp_all


paragraph â€¹When the target is a schematic variableâ€º

text â€¹Schematic variables occurring in source are assigned with zeros, and is
  covered by Â§â€¹Phi_BI/Bottom/Transformation_Rulesâ€ºâ€º

ML â€¹
(* (â‹€x. X x ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ?Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P) where ?Y is a variable.
   When X contains some quantified variables â€¹xâ€º that do not parameterize ?Y, the procedure
   existentially qualifies X, and assign â€¹âˆƒx. X xâ€º to ?Y.
   cannot work on â€¹_ âˆ—[_] _â€º (*TODO, but the thing is there is no type embedding of existence,
                                     unless we use Î£ and ğ’®, but... mmmmm.... well, a lot of work.*)
 *)
fun apply_refl_by_unifying (refl, exintro', Gx, Gy) ctxt thm =
  let val (vs, _, goal) = Phi_Help.leading_antecedent (Thm.prop_of thm)
      val N = length vs
      val (X0,Y0,_) = Phi_Syntax.dest_transformation goal
      val (X, Y) = (Gx X0, Gy Y0)
      val (Var V, args) = strip_comb Y
      val bnos = map_filter (fn Bound i => SOME i | _ => NONE) args
      val bads = subtract (op =) bnos (Term.loose_bnos X)
   in if null bads
   then Phi_Reasoner.single_RS refl ctxt thm
   else case exintro'
     of NONE => Seq.empty
      | SOME exintro => let
      val N_bads = length bads
      val N_bnos = length bnos
      val (argTys, \<^Type>â€¹BI â€¹TYâ€ºâ€º) = Term.strip_type (snd V)
      val insts' = List.tabulate (N, fn i =>
            let val bi = find_index (fn k => k = i) bads
                val ci = find_index (fn k => k = i) bnos
             in if bi <> ~1
                then Bound (N_bads - 1 - bi)
                else if ci <> ~1
                then Bound (N_bads + N_bnos - 1 - ci)
                else Term.dummy (*not occur*)
            end)
      val Y'1 = subst_bounds (insts', X)
      val Y'2 = fold_rev (fn j => fn TM =>
                  let val (name,T) = List.nth (vs, N-1-j)
                   in \<^Const>â€¹ExBI â€¹Tâ€º â€¹TYâ€ºâ€º $ Abs (name, T, TM)
                  end) bads Y'1
      val Y'3 = fold_rev (fn (_, Bound j) => (fn TM =>
                            let val (name,T) = List.nth (vs, N-1-j)
                             in Abs (name, T, TM)
                            end)
                       | (ty, _) => (fn TM => Abs ("_", ty, TM))
                     ) (argTys ~~ args) Y'2
   in Thm.instantiate (TVars.empty, Vars.make [(V, Thm.cterm_of ctxt Y'3)]) thm
   |> funpow N_bads (fn th => exintro RS th)
   |> Phi_Reasoner.single_RS refl ctxt
   handle THM _ => Seq.empty
  end
  end
â€º

Ï†reasoner_ML transformation_refl_var %ToA_assigning_var (â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ?var_Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º) = â€¹
  fn (_, (ctxt,thm)) => Seq.map (pair ctxt) (apply_refl_by_unifying (
          @{thm' transformation_refl[THEN Action_Tag_I[where A=ğ’¯ğ’«]]},
          SOME @{thm' ExBI_transformation_I[THEN Action_Tag_I[where A=ğ’¯ğ’«], OF Action_Tag_D[where A=ğ’¯ğ’«]]},
          I, I
      ) ctxt thm) â€º

Ï†reasoner_ML transformation_refl_var_R %ToA_assigning_var (â€¹_ * _ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ?var_Y ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º) = â€¹
  fn (_, (ctxt,thm)) => Seq.map (pair ctxt) (apply_refl_by_unifying (
          @{thm' transformation_refl_assigning_remainder[THEN Action_Tag_I[where A=ğ’¯ğ’«]]},
          SOME @{thm' ExBI_transformation_I_R[THEN Action_Tag_I[where A=ğ’¯ğ’«], OF Action_Tag_D[where A=ğ’¯ğ’«]]},
          (fn _ $ A $ R => A), (fn _ (*REMAINS*) $ A $ _ => A)
      ) ctxt thm) â€º

text â€¹Here, we assign the semantics of schematic variables occurring in targets and sources to be,
  a wild-card for any single separation item.â€º

text â€¹
TODO: move me!

NToA procedure addresses the transformation between any-to-many Ï†-type items.
  Separation Extraction addresses that from many to one Ï†-type item.
  The Ï†-type themselves should provide the rules for one-to-one transformations, as they are primitive.
  Transformation Functor presented later provides an automation for this.

  However, a small supplementary is one-to-one with remainders.
  For unital algebras, the issue is easy as we can always force yielding remainders.
  For non-semigroups, after a reasoning branch splitting the cases for having remainder or not,
  the issue reduces immediately.
  For associative but non-unital algebras, a bit of work is required. 

â€º

subsubsection â€¹Varify Target Objectâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason default %ToA_varify_target_object for â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ â¦‚ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º
                                              except â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ?var_y' â¦‚ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º ]:
  â€¹ x â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ U ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ y. r y @tag ğ’œexhausitive_simp False True
âŸ¹ Object_Equiv U eq
âŸ¹ ğ—Œğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¿ğ—’ P : (âˆ€y'. r y' âŸ¶ eq y' y)
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ x â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Q @tag ğ’¯ğ’«
âŸ¹ ğ—‰ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ—‚ğ—Œğ–¾ P
âŸ¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ y â¦‚ U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Q @tag ğ’¯ğ’« â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def Transformation_def Premise_def Object_Equiv_def Simplify_def
  by clarsimp metis

lemma [Ï†reason default %ToA_varify_target_object for â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ â¦‚ _ ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º

  unfolding Action_Tag_def Transformation_def Premise_def Object_Equiv_def Simplify_def

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_normalizing]:
  " T1 * (T2 * R) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ (T1 * T2) * R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P"
  for R :: â€¹'a::sep_semigroup BIâ€º
  unfolding mult.assoc .

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_normalizing]:
  " T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X1 * (X2 * R) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (X1 * X2) * R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P"

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_splitting_target]:

âŸ¹ ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ P1 âŸ¶ (R ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P2 @tag ğ’¯ğ’«)
âŸ¹ A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ X * Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P1 âˆ§ P2 @tag ğ’¯ğ’«"

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_splitting_target]:

structure ToA_Hooks = Hooks (
  type arg = {deep: bool}
  type state = context_state
)

val NToA_init_having_Q = @{lemma
  â€¹ X ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ Q
âŸ¹ ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ Q âŸ¶ (X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«)

  by (clarsimp simp: ğ—‹EIF_def Simplify_def Identity_Elementâ‡©I_def Satisfiable_def Premise_def
                     Action_Tag_def Transformation_def, blast)}

Ï†reasoner_ML ToR_Entry_Point 2000 (â€¹?X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ?Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— ?var_Pâ€º) = â€¹
fn (_, (ctxt,sequent)) => Seq.make (fn () =>
  let val sequent = skolemize_transformation ctxt sequent
      val (ctxt, sequent) = normalize_source_of_ToA (ctxt, sequent)
      val sequent = @{thm' Action_Tag_D[where A=â€¹ğ’¯ğ’«â€º]} RS sequent

subsubsection â€¹Supplementary for Ex \& Conj \label{supp-ex-conj}â€º

ML â€¹fun ToA_ex_intro_reasoning (ctxt,sequent) =
  let val (_, X'', _) = Phi_Syntax.dest_transformation (Thm.major_prem_of sequent)
      fun parse (Const(\<^const_name>â€¹ExBIâ€º, \<^Type>â€¹fun \<^Type>â€¹fun ty _â€º _â€º) $ X) = (false, ty, X)
        | parse (Const(\<^const_name>â€¹REMAINSâ€º, _) $ (Const(\<^const_name>â€¹ExBIâ€º, \<^Type>â€¹fun \<^Type>â€¹fun ty _â€º _â€º) $ X) $ _)
            = (true, ty, X)
        | parse X = parse (Envir.beta_eta_contract X)
      val (has_focus, _, X'1) = parse X''
      val X = case X'1 of Abs (_, _, X) => X | X => Term.incr_boundvars 1 X $ Bound 0
      val ex_var_is_in_obj_only = Phi_Syntax.forall_item_of_assertion_blv (fn (_,lv) =>
                                    (fn (Const(\<^const_name>â€¹Ï†Typeâ€º, _) $ _ $ T) => not (Term.loose_bvar1 (T, lv))
                                      | A => not (Term.loose_bvar1 (A, lv)))) []
      val rule0 = if has_focus
                  then if ex_var_is_in_obj_only X
                  then @{thm' ExBI_transformation_I_R[where x=â€¹id câ€º for c,
                                      OF Action_Tag_D[where A=â€¹ğ’¯ğ’«â€º], THEN Action_Tag_I[where A=â€¹ğ’¯ğ’«â€º]]}
                  else @{thm' ExBI_transformation_I_R[
                                      OF Action_Tag_D[where A=â€¹ğ’¯ğ’«â€º], THEN Action_Tag_I[where A=â€¹ğ’¯ğ’«â€º]]}
                  else if ex_var_is_in_obj_only X
                  then @{thm' ExBI_transformation_I[where x=â€¹id câ€º for c,
                                      OF Action_Tag_D[where A=â€¹ğ’¯ğ’«â€º], THEN Action_Tag_I[where A=â€¹ğ’¯ğ’«â€º]]}
                  else @{thm' ExBI_transformation_I[
                                      OF Action_Tag_D[where A=â€¹ğ’¯ğ’«â€º], THEN Action_Tag_I[where A=â€¹ğ’¯ğ’«â€º]]}
   in SOME ((ctxt, rule0 RS sequent), Seq.empty)
  endâ€º

Ï†reasoner_ML ToA_ex_intro default ! %ToA_inst_qunat ( â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ExBI _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º

  = â€¹fn stat => Seq.make (fn () => ToA_ex_intro_reasoning (snd stat))â€º

                    of (_, Const(\<^const_name>â€¹ExBIâ€º, _) $ X, _) =>

                                                   | _ => false) X
                            then Seq.make (fn () => ToA_ex_intro_reasoning (ctxt,sequent))

                     | _ => Seq.empty)
   in SOME ((ctxt, @{thm' NToA_conj_src_A
                            [OF Action_Tag_D[where A=â€¹ğ’¯ğ’«â€º], THEN Action_Tag_I[where A=â€¹ğ’¯ğ’«â€º]]} RS sequent),

âŸ¹ fst (x,y) â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P â€º

âŸ¹ snd (x,y) â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P â€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red]:
  â€¹ (x, z) â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ (fst (x,y), z) â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P â€º
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red]:
  â€¹ (y, z) â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ (snd (x,y), z) â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P â€º
  by simp

  â€¹ (x, y) â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ (x, fst (y, z)) â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P â€º

âŸ¹ (x, snd (y, z)) â¦‚ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P â€º

declare [[Ï†chk_source_val = true]]

subsubsection â€¹Letâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red]:
  " T x ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ Let x T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P"
  unfolding Let_def .

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red]:
  " T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U x ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Let x U ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P"
  unfolding Let_def .

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red]:
  " T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ U x ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Let x U ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P"
  unfolding Let_def .

subsubsection â€¹Case Prodâ€º

Ï†reasoner_group ToA_red_caseprod =
  (%ToA_red, [%ToA_red, %ToA_red+10]) for (â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ case_prod _ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _â€º, â€¹case_prod _ _ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _â€º)
  â€¹Transformations reducing â€¹case_prodâ€ºâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red_caseprod+10]:
  " T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ f x y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ case_prod f (x,y) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P"
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red_caseprod+10]:
  " T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ f x y ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ case_prod f (x,y) ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P"
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red_caseprod+10]:
  " A x y ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ case_prod A (x,y) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P"
  by simp

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red_caseprod]:
  " T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ f (fst xy) (snd xy) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ case_prod f xy ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P"
  unfolding Transformation_def
  by (cases xy; simp)

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red_caseprod]:
  " T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ f (fst xy) (snd xy) ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ T ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ case_prod f xy ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ R ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P"
  unfolding Transformation_def
  by (cases xy; simp)

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red_caseprod]:
  " A (fst xy) (snd xy) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ case_prod A xy ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P"
  by (cases xy; simp)

  â€¹ If C (x â¦‚ A) (x â¦‚ B) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ If C A B ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Pâ€º
  by (cases C; simp)

text â€¹\<^term>â€¹x â¦‚ (If C T U) âœ¼ Wâ€º is not reduced because the â€¹Câ‡©Wâ€º and â€¹Wâ€º have to be specially assigned.â€º

                                      variable?â€º
  â€¹ If C ((x â¦‚ A) * W) ((x â¦‚ B) * W) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P

  by (cases C; simp)

subparagraph â€¹Normalizingâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_red for â€¹If (id ?var) _ _ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º]:

  â€¹ x â¦‚ If C T U âœ¼ W ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ If (id C) T U âœ¼ W ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'â€º

  â€¹ X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ If C A B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«

  by simp

subparagraph â€¹Sourceâ€º

text â€¹the â€¹id ?xâ€º here is the protector generated by instantiating existence in target.â€º

        for â€¹(if ?var_condition then ?A else ?B) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ ?X ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— ?P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º]]

paragraph â€¹Case Splitâ€º

Ï†reasoner_group ToA_splitting_If = (%ToA_splitting, [%ToA_splitting, %ToA_splitting+1])
                                   for (â€¹If C A B ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Yâ€º, â€¹X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ If C A Bâ€º)
                                    in ToA_splitting
  â€¹ToA splitting â€¹Ifâ€º in either source or target, into two sub-goals.â€º

subparagraph â€¹Sourceâ€º

lemma ToA_cond_branch_src:
  â€¹ Y = If C Ya Yb
âŸ¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡   C âŸ¶ (A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Ya ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«))
âŸ¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ Â¬ C âŸ¶ (B ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Yb ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Q @tag ğ’¯ğ’«))
âŸ¹ If C A B ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— If C P Q @tag ğ’¯ğ’« â€º
  unfolding Action_Tag_def
  by (cases C; simp add: Premise_def Orelse_shortcut_def)

lemma ToA_cond_branch_src_R:
  â€¹ Y = If C Ya Yb
âŸ¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡   C âŸ¶ (A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Ya ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ Ra ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«))
âŸ¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ Â¬ C âŸ¶ (B ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Yb ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ Rb ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Q @tag ğ’¯ğ’«))
âŸ¹ If C A B ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ If C Ra Rb ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— If C P Q @tag ğ’¯ğ’« â€º
  by (cases C; simp add: Premise_def Orelse_shortcut_def)

(*lemma ToA_cond_branch_src_R':
  â€¹ Y â‰¡ If C Ya Yb
âŸ¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡   C âŸ¹ ((ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ False) âˆ§ P = False) âˆ¨â‡©câ‡©uâ‡©t (A ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Ya ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ[True] Ra ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P))
âŸ¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ Â¬ C âŸ¹ ((ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ False) âˆ§ Q = False) âˆ¨â‡©câ‡©uâ‡©t (B ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Yb ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—†ğ–ºğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—Œ[True] Rb ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Q))

  by (cases C; simp add: Premise_def Orelse_shortcut_def)

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_splitting_If]:
  â€¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡   C âŸ¹ (x â¦‚ Tâ‡©a âœ¼ Wâ‡©a ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ yâ‡©a â¦‚ U âœ¼ Ra ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'))
âŸ¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ Â¬ C âŸ¹ (x â¦‚ Tâ‡©b âœ¼ Wâ‡©b ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ yâ‡©b â¦‚ U âœ¼ Rb ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Q  @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'))
âŸ¹ x â¦‚ (If C Tâ‡©a Tâ‡©b) âœ¼ (If C Wâ‡©a Wâ‡©b) ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ If C yâ‡©a yâ‡©b â¦‚ U âœ¼ If C Ra Rb ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— If C P Q @tag ğ’¯ğ’«' â€º
  unfolding Try_def
  by (cases C; simp add: Premise_def Orelse_shortcut_def)
  
ML â€¹
fun reasoner_ToA_conditioned_subgoals_If ctxt'N (vars,Y,RHS) =
  let val (C, Ya, Yb) = Phi_Help.dest_triop_c \<^const_name>â€¹Ifâ€º RHS
      val C_term = Thm.term_of C

      val Ya_s = map (fn ((N,i),ty) => Thm.var ((N,i+2), Thm.ctyp_of ctxt'N ty)) vars
      val Yb_s = map (fn ((N,i),ty) => Thm.var ((N,i+3), Thm.ctyp_of ctxt'N ty)) vars 
      val Y_s  = map2 (fn a => fn b =>
                   let val ty = Thm.typ_of_cterm a
                    in Thm.apply (Thm.apply (
                          Thm.apply (Thm.cterm_of ctxt'N \<^Const>â€¹If tyâ€º) C
                        ) a
                        ) b
                   end) Ya_s Yb_s
      val Ya' = Thm.instantiate_cterm (TVars.empty, Vars.make (vars ~~ Ya_s)) Y
      val Yb' = Thm.instantiate_cterm (TVars.empty, Vars.make (vars ~~ Yb_s)) Y
      fun mk_inst ctm Y =
        case Thm.term_of ctm
          of _ $ Free _ => mk_inst (Thm.dest_fun ctm) (Thm.lambda (Thm.dest_arg ctm) Y)
           | Var v => (v, Y)
           | _ => error "BUG: reasoner_ToA_conditioned_subgoals"
 
   in (Vars.make (mk_inst Ya Ya' :: mk_inst Yb Yb' :: (vars ~~ Y_s)), C_term)
  end
â€º


lemma If_distrib_fx:
  â€¹(If C fa fb) (If C va vb) â‰¡ (If C (fa va) (fb vb))â€º
  unfolding atomize_eq
  by (cases C; simp)

lemma If_distrib_arg:
  â€¹(If C fa fb) a â‰¡ (If C (fa a) (fb a))â€º
  unfolding atomize_eq
  by (cases C; simp)
 
Ï†reasoner_ML â€¹ML (If C A B ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ Y ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«)â€º %ToA_splitting_If
             ( â€¹If _ _ _ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º
             | except â€¹If ?var _ _ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º)
  = â€¹Phi_Reasoners.reasoner_ToA_conditioned_subgoals
         (@{thm' ToA_cond_branch_src}, @{thm' ToA_cond_branch_src_R},
          (true, @{thms' if_cancel[folded atomize_eq]}, @{thms' if_True if_False}),
          reasoner_ToA_conditioned_subgoals_If, \<^context>) o sndâ€º

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_splitting_If except â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ (if ?var then _ else _) ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«â€º]:
  â€¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ C âŸ¶ (X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ A ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— P @tag ğ’¯ğ’«))
âŸ¹ (ğ–¼ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ–½ğ—‚ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ˆğ—‡ Â¬ C âŸ¶ (X ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ B ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— Q @tag ğ’¯ğ’«))

lemma [Ï†reason %ToA_splitting_If except â€¹_ ğ—ğ—‹ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—Œğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‹ğ—†ğ—Œ _ â¦‚ (if ?var then _ else _) âœ¼ _ ğ—ğ—‚ğ—ğ— _ @tag ğ’¯ğ’«'â€º]:
